, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">How can an Italian\ncatholic woman understand the Hindu ethos ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UgoOP9cy2mM/U6kCcIb77yI/AAAAAAAAs_s/VgwTGIZc3s8/s1600/1016678_10151666088913cf826_361991130_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UgoOP9cy2mM/U6kCcIb77yI/AAAAAAAAs_s/VgwTGIZc3s8/s1600/1016678_10151666088913cf826_361991130_n.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her inner coterie has\ntermed Ganges pollution as Hindus immersing ashes , flowers , clay idols and\nsetting afloat lighted clay diyas in the river .&nbsp; Yet, they have named a pumping station as\n\u201cThe Sonia Vihar pumping station\u201d&nbsp; in\n2006.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader had\nmore respect for the Ganga that the inner coterie of the waitress . Almost a\ncentury back when the British were planning to check the flow of the Ganga at\nHaridwar, Madan Mohan Malviya , some kings, and the 4 Shankaracharyas , with\nthe public united in protest.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British invader relented. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chief Sec. of the United\nProvinces, I.C.S., R.Burns passed order no 1002 on 20-4-1917 to \u2018maintain a\nfree flow of the Ganga.\u2019 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The National River\nConservation Authority set up in 1995 with the Prime Minister heading it had\nits last meeting in 2003\u2014 the UPA chairperson must explain why there is such\napathy when 500 million people are affected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Hindus, regardless\nof their sects and castes , believe in the sacred purifying powers of the\nGanges.&nbsp; They worship the river by\nbathing in it, drinking its waters, praying to it, invoking it in oaths, and\nchanting its name.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bathing in the\nGanges has become an important part of a vast number of Hindu ceremonies and\nfestivals.&nbsp;&nbsp; Even sacred statues of\ndeities are bathed in the Ganges after being first created.&nbsp; For millenniums&nbsp; Ganga is considered as the holiest of the\nholy rivers, serving as a gateway for souls to escape the cycle of endless\nrebirths and attain salvation.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu\nfirmly believed that drinking water from the Ganga at one's deathbed enables\nhim or her to attain salvation. Their life is incomplete without bathing in the\nGanga atleast once in their lifetime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Charak samhita, the\nancient medical treatise,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">characterizes Ganga\nwater as pure, and sacred. It says that no germ, bacteria or fungi canthrive in\nit. Hence Ganga water is revered as holy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know who wrote\nthe Charaka Samhita and when ? It was penned at a time when the white man was\nliving in damp caves, doing grunt grunt for language, and eating raw meat by\nclubbing down animals , 6200 years ago. During this time, his Indian\ncounterpart was wearing silk, writing poetry, eating cooked food from a menu\nand living is proper houses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>FATHERS OF SURGERY AND\nMEDICINE 4200 BC&nbsp; VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The common Indian knows\nonly that Gangajal does not deteriorate.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>Supposing you take water that has gone through reverse osmosis,\nactivated charcoal ,<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>ultraviolet\ntreatment, etc., if you keep it for two<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;\n</span>more years, it will go bad, but Gangajal won\u2019t.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">93%&nbsp; percent of leather products produced by the\ntanneries which pollute the holy Ganga is destined for fashion markets in\nEurope and the United States\u2014 and we pollute our lands and water resources, for\nthese people who look down on Indians .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JW3Gd19bKaQ/U6hhcsGrZ9I/AAAAAAAAs-I/gIHwHI8dfYU/s1600/downj65load.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JW3Gd19bKaQ/U6hhcsGrZ9I/AAAAAAAAs-I/gIHwHI8dfYU/s1600/downj65load.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Jw_OETVUWKU/U6hhe-f6IgI/AAAAAAAAs-Q/DwgpxW22Br0/s1600/0,,16136159_303,00.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Jw_OETVUWKU/U6hhe-f6IgI/AAAAAAAAs-Q/DwgpxW22Br0/s1600/0,,16136159_303,00.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In recent times more\nthan 20,000 crores has been spent on cleansing the Ganga. What is the export\nincome of the leather we export? A small percentage of this amount, right?\nWhere is the economics , even if we are economics driven ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why are we putting\ndeadly chemicals in the Ganges ? For what ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-d-QPAcpirRc/U6hh4ZW7RdI/AAAAAAAAs-g/twVZAvxMjSY/s1600/2012_professional_00010751_pvvhoto09_resized.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-d-QPAcpirRc/U6hh4ZW7RdI/AAAAAAAAs-g/twVZAvxMjSY/s1600/2012_professional_00010751_pvvhoto09_resized.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Five hundred million people, about 8 percent of the world's population,\nlive in the Ganges basin. Out of the 2,300 towns in the country, 692 are\nlocated in this basin, and of these, 100 are located along the river bank\nitself.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the snooty white men who want\nleather on their expensive car seats and fancy purses for their women are more\nimportant?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-djfOrRcZyJQ/U6hiF_u2mDI/AAAAAAAAs-o/BdhnEedk0S4/s1600/Kanpur-Leather-Sean-Gallagher-12.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-djfOrRcZyJQ/U6hiF_u2mDI/AAAAAAAAs-o/BdhnEedk0S4/s1600/Kanpur-Leather-Sean-Gallagher-12.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The leather industry in Kanpur from more than 400 tanneries uses\nchemicals such as toxic and carcinogenic chromium compounds. The tanneries\nsignificantly increased the pollution load of river as they discharge huge\namounts of effluents containing organic wastes and heavy metals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3YPW4XjT9ZE/U6hiQ-PrjlI/AAAAAAAAs-w/7YLPut8EHWY/s1600/chromium-pollution-tannerieseff-world-map.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"494\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3YPW4XjT9ZE/U6hiQ-PrjlI/AAAAAAAAs-w/7YLPut8EHWY/s1600/chromium-pollution-tannerieseff-world-map.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tannery\nindustry of Kanpur has coverted the Ganges to a gutter running to the sea.-- a\ndumping ground. They discharge different types of effluent\nwaste into the river containing toxic chemicals .&nbsp; This pollutes the river water directly or\nindirectly causes health hazards like cancer, renal failure and much other\nwater related diseases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uZPbkw493Ug/U6hiXuYTe2I/AAAAAAAAs-4/r3c0Z_Gz-c8/s1600/f3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"306\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uZPbkw493Ug/U6hiXuYTe2I/AAAAAAAAs-4/r3c0Z_Gz-c8/s1600/f3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">90% of these tanneries\nuse Chromium as the tanning agent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9u3nYvW2pWY/U6hifanyMqI/AAAAAAAAs_A/eMVimLt4I6U/s1600/downlojtyrkad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9u3nYvW2pWY/U6hifanyMqI/AAAAAAAAs_A/eMVimLt4I6U/s1600/downlojtyrkad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many Indians have\ncontracted painful skin conditions, respiratory diseases, and deadly waterborne\nillnesses such as typhoid, polio, and jaundice after drinking or bathing in the\nGanges River.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA IS A HUGE MARKET\nFOR MEDICINES PRODUCED BY THE EVIL PHARMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Draining of industrial\neffluent into rivers should be completely banned. Industries should recycle the\nindustrial waste and use only recycled water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Industrial effluents\nand hospital wastes treated or untreated and also sewage from the cities and\ntowns treated or untreated, must not&nbsp; be\nallowed to enter into the river.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">skins go through an\nextensive chemical treatment from the time they are scoured with lime to when\nthey are treated with chromium salts. The chromium lends a greenish hue to the\ndrinking water the city draws from the river.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organic wastes - hair, flesh, and\nother animal remains - are thrown into the river, giving it a fetid stench. As\nthey sink into the water, they mingle with the effluents of some 70 other\nindustrial plants mainly sugar factories that disgorge a thick molasses-like\nsubstance, and textile companies that throw in various bleaches, dyes, and\nacids.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kanpur also contributes to the river about 400 million liters of sewage\neach day. Alarming levels of Arsenic, Cadmium, Mercury, Nickel and Chrome(VI)\nin the above mentioned samples have been found.&nbsp;\nThe blue and black slime that oozes from the tanneries is deadly poison\n, laden with chromium sulfate, sodium sulfide and a score of other toxic acids,\nfats, salts, dyes and synthetic chemicals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jSwNkd7RUy4/U6hmbWMeUFI/AAAAAAAAs_U/doy-mDnZEls/s1600/gazipur-bbfaste.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"444\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jSwNkd7RUy4/U6hmbWMeUFI/AAAAAAAAs_U/doy-mDnZEls/s1600/gazipur-bbfaste.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When chromium-laced waste is dumped\ninto regional water systems, it can damage fish gills, incite respiratory\nproblems, infections, infertility, and birth defects. It can also instigate a\nnumber of serious cancers in animals throughout the food chain. Chromium has\nbeen linked to increased rates of asthma, bronchitis, polyps of the upper\nrespiratory tract, pharyngitis, and the enlargement of the hilar region and\nlymph nodes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An average of 35 m3\nwaste water is produced per ton of raw hide.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This wastewater contains:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- salts (Cl), fat,\nprotein, preservatives (soaking);<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- lime and ammonium\nsalts, ammonia, protein (hair), and sulphides (fleshing, trimming, bating);</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- chromium(salts) and\npolyphenolic compounds (tanning); and</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- dye and solvent\nchemicals (wet-finishing).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7uc5FcfVOuM/U6hmoBq-eFI/AAAAAAAAs_c/_9kmctlqPuE/s1600/India-Kanpur-Leathlu;er-Pollution-021-990x660.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7uc5FcfVOuM/U6hmoBq-eFI/AAAAAAAAs_c/_9kmctlqPuE/s1600/India-Kanpur-Leathlu;er-Pollution-021-990x660.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solid waste produced\nconsists of fleshings containing lime, chromium containing \u2018wet-blue\u2019 shavings\nand of trimmings (leather).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tanning in the process\nconverting putrescible skin into non-putriscible \"leather\". Usually\nwith tannin, and acidic chemical compound that prevents decomposition .&nbsp; Chrome tanning, the process most common today\nbased on the use of chrome salts and requiring only a few hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chromium-tanned leather\nis the most popular form of producing leather these days, and one of the most\nnoxious. It relies on a toxic slush of chromium salts and tanning liquor to\nproduce a supple and often light blue coloured product.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prepared hides are\nfirst pickled in a vat of chromium until the material\u2019s pH drops to 3.0,\nthen they\u2019re transferred to a secondary vat filled with tanning liquor which\npenetrates the leather.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the liquor has been thoroughly and evenly\nabsorbed, the pH of the vat is increased to 4.0. This fixes the\ntanning material to the leather at a molecular level and helps reduce the\namount of shrinkage experienced when the leather is submerged in warm water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-H217F9ZjxiA/U6hmNR-nvpI/AAAAAAAAs_M/010ILLwEoo8/s1600/Kanpur-Leather-Sean-Gallagher-02.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-H217F9ZjxiA/U6hmNR-nvpI/AAAAAAAAs_M/010ILLwEoo8/s1600/Kanpur-Leather-Sean-Gallagher-02.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the tanning\noperation proper has been completed, the leather is allowed to dry. Then the\n\u201ccrusting\u201d procedure begins. &nbsp;The leather may be thinned, retanned, and\nlubricated before being coloured, softened, and shaped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chromium compounds are\napplied to protect hides from decay and to make them more durable against\nmoisture and aging.&nbsp; Hospitals are full\nwith kidney&nbsp; and liver patients in the vicinity\nof these areas .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody cares to check\nif these tanneries have the requisite waste treatment facilities, and how they\ndispose their effluents .&nbsp; Does this take\ntoo much of effort if the person is committed to a cause ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every child must be\neducated about the effect of non-biodegradables like plastics and toxic&nbsp; / bioaccumulative chemicals in the river\nwater. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Offenders must be captured on\na mobile phone camera and then punished -&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>KICK THEIR FU#KIN' ASSES-- AND KICK THEM GOOD .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bioaccumulation occurs when an organism\nabsorbs a toxic substance at a rate greater than that at which the substance is\nlost.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India's National Botanical Research Institute, a government body, has\ntested agricultural and dairy products in the Kanpur area and found that they\ncontain high levels of chromium and arsenic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An estimated 3 million tonnes &nbsp;of sewage is released into the Ganges each\nday, of which very little is processed by sewage treatment plants. Ever since\ndams have been built, the banks on either side do NOT get the benefit of floods\ndepositing fertile silt into the super fertile humous soil.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now the farmer is\nforced to use artificial fertilizers which makes the soul very thirsty.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chemical pollution threatens not only humans, but also more than 140 fish species,\n90 amphibian species and the endangered Ganges river dolphin. People&nbsp; living along the Gnaga banks in Uttar\nPradesh,Bihar and Bengal are more prone to cancer than anywhere else in the\ncountry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gallbladder cancer cases along the river course are the second highest\nin the world and prostate cancer highest in the country\u2014 thanks to the\nexcessive amounts of arsenic, choride, fluoride and other heavy metals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Laws\nmust be made and enforces to dispose off&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">battery</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;cells properly, like plastics\n. The need of the hour is to&nbsp;strictly implement laws regulating discharge of\nindustrial waste into the river.</span></span> <span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sewage\ntreatment plants and incinerators must be privatized, with double generator\npower backup. If they are run by the govt , there must be zero tolerance to dereliction\nof duty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If PM Narendra Modi\ncleans up the Ganges , in the first 5 years \u2014 he will be in power for atleast\n20 years .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A very easy way to get\nblown off&nbsp; in the 2019 elections is to\nimplement the BJP No 1 MAD election manifesto of Interlinking Indian rivers and\nkilling the holy Ganga , irreversibly , once and for all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A day after his\nelection victory Modi traveled to Varanasi to perform aarti ( a fire ritual )\nin honour of the sacred river.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Now it is time to\ndo my bit for Maa Ganga,\" he said in a passionate speech from the Varanasi\nghat. \"Maa Ganga is waiting for her son to free her from pollution.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modi has said that he\nwants to replicate the Sabarmati model. It is NOT so easy , for&nbsp; Sabarmati is a short piss fart river ( about\n370 km long)&nbsp; and the mighty Ganga is\n2,525 km. The ecosystem of Ganges is complex and different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the World Bank has\ntermed the Ganga clean-up a \u2018high-risk\u2019 project . All say Modi government is\nstaring at a Herculean task that could take many years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The solution is VERY\nsimple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purity of the water\ndepends on the velocity and the dilution capacity of the river. &nbsp;Maintain good water flow in the Ganges at all\ntimes, to sustain its self purification capability. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Some useless white\nelephant dams on the Ganges may have to be decommissioned and broken up.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Uttarachal floods the UPA govt has\nNOT been transparent to the severe damade to several dams . I shall be\ntransparent in this post--later.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water which flow down\nthe Ganges&nbsp; water is NOT wasted into the\nsea like stupid people think.&nbsp; All the\nwater in the ganges is NOT melted ice water. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Salt water intrusions into India\u2019s coastal\nground water aquifers started only after dams deprived rivers off the natural\nflow into the sea. The fish catch around the Indian coast has decreased after\nthe flow of fresh water into the sea has been reduced. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chrome can be recycled.\nThere are proven techniques such as direct recycling \u2014 which uses the same\nchromium bath for both the initial tanning and subsequent re-tanning stage .\nThis can reduce chromium levels in wastewater. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By reclaiming chromium, either by rapidly precipitating it out of the\nacid bath using sodium hydroxide or sodium carbonate or slowly pulling it out\nwith magnesium oxide, &nbsp;one can recapture\nat &nbsp;30 per cent of the bath\u2019s chrome\ncontent. &nbsp;&nbsp;A mix of 70 per cent new\nchrome and 30 per cent recaptured chrome produces nearly identical results as\nusing 100 per cent new chrome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Take this from a perceptive\nman-- spending thousands of crores to clean Ganga ( like in the past ) will not\nhelp until its normal flow is restored. &nbsp;Of\ncourse this does NOT mean that industries will be able to discharge toxic\nchemicals into the Ganges. &nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sewage treatment plans\nand incinerator with double generator power backup must be installed. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There must be a plastic\nfree zone on either side of the Ganges. Heavy fines must be imposed , with exemplary\nimprisonment for repeated defaulters. &nbsp;Spent batteries must be given special\nattention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No defecation must be allowed\non the river banks. Proper toilets must be constructed. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Charity begins at home.\n&nbsp;We have enough money to give 10 Billion\nEuros to Italy zone\u2014nay- Euro zone , so that they can drink better wines- but\nour women still defecate in the open, though we got independence from the white\ninvader &nbsp;in 1947.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the drive for\neconomic growth we cannot sell the soul of Bharatmata and make the Hindu self\nloathing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evangelists have converted many such self loathing Hindus, who are\ndisillusioned by the apathy shown to the river . &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matri Dham Ashram, literally,\nthe abode of the mother, dedicated to Mother Mary, was set up in 1954, in\nVaranasi, by the Indian Missionary Society (IMS). &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kasi (Varanasi ) is the Mecca / Vatican /\nJerusalem of Hindusim and finds a mention in the 7000 year old Vedas and in our\nHindu epics Ramayana and Mahabhaata.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader called it Benares of the\nHindoos.&nbsp; The celebrated Chinese traveler\nXuanzang, who visited the city around 635 AD, attested that the city was a\ncentre of religious c activities, and that it extended more than 5\nkilometres&nbsp; along the western bank of the\nGanges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1194 Muslim invader\nQutb-ud-din Aibak destroyed all the major temples in Kasi , including the\nVishwanath temple, and built mosques on the foundations of many of them.&nbsp; The Gyanvapi Masjid, which was re- built by\nAurangazeb is built on the original site .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The remnants of the original\nVishwanath temple are revered by the devout Hindus as Shrinagar Gauri, the\nabode of Lord Mahadev. Muslims offer namaz in the premises of the Gyanvapi\nmasjid but not in the main hall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Turkic king ruled\nfrom his capital in Delhi where he built the Qutub Minar and the Quwwat Al\nIslam mosque. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1897, Mark Twain,\nthe renowned Indophile, said of Varanasi, \"Benares is older than history,\nolder than tradition, older even than legend, and looks twice as old as all of\nthem put together.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We know this already ,\nas Kashi , the spiritual capital of the Hindus , was called Shiv Nagar and is one of the oldest continuously inhabited\ncities in the world finding a mention in the 7000 year old Rig Veda.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every tanneries on the\nbanks of the Ganges must mandatorily fit chrome-recovery facilities .&nbsp; The govt can provide loans and technical\nexpertise.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However the effluent\nmust be tested at regular intervals \u2013surprise tests without advance warning.\nThe effluent must be sampled using proper procedures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know of some\nproper procedures ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>SAMPLING PROCEDURES\nCHEMICAL TANKERS AJIT VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On chemical tankers I\ncommanded at sea, we carry liquids from wine to orange juice to olive oils to\nsulphuric acid to cyanides to clay slurry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have worked on\nchemical tankers where the ship has entered almost every &nbsp;to major ports navigable river on this planet.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Nowhere have I seen so much laxity in\ncontrolling water pollution. &nbsp;How about\nplacing non-biodegradable garbage receptacles on either side of the ganges ? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Countless tanneries,\nchemical plants, textile mills, distilleries, slaughterhouses, and hospitals merrily\ndump untreated waste into the river. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We\nmust have a soccer game WARNING CARD SYSTEM \u2013 say with 5 colours. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">These colours must be pasted on their compound\ngates using environment ministry ribbons.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">This will NAME AND SHAME these desh\ndrohis.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When the industry is RED\nCARDED on the 5<sup>th</sup> notch, the unit must be shut down and the top\nmanager sent to jail.&nbsp; &nbsp;Well this is what happens at sea. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">They just catch the captain and imprison him.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IG89g9Lhj0Y/U6lARSuiIjI/AAAAAAAAtAM/OVfYHE0HWWU/s1600/62v+vvx471.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lead and cadmium are\nequally heavy and naturally sink in the river. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rogue plant owners\nhave been getting excused stating that the Govt cut off their power , and hence\nthey could NOT run their sewage treatment plants and incinerators. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well my dear rogues\u2014buy\npower generators\u2014two of them if you please, with proper stock of minimum\nrequired spare parts. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They even blame god for\nit by saying floods submerged their electric liquid pumps and blowers . &nbsp;If so put it at a higher place. And if you\ncant be ready to pay and heavy fine and go to jail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These rogues may\nattempt to clandestinely divert their waste water from the river to a hidden\npit in the ground. &nbsp;&nbsp;Well by doing this they pollute the ground\nwater aquifer. &nbsp;&nbsp;Citizens all around will\nget all sorts of water based diseases, including cancer.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\nmust be ZERO TOLERANCE when it comes to rogues trying to hoodwink the govt\ninspectors. These inspectors must be\nrotated and sent in groups of five with ethnic and cultural differences so that\nthey cant cheat as a posse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ganga Action Plan which was part of the\nMinistry of Environment and Forests (MoEF) has now been shifted under Water\nResources Minister Uma Bharti. &nbsp;She is\ncommitted to the Ganga, but mere commitment cannot save the day. &nbsp;She must KNOW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iSngDipLvIM/U6lDwksfS5I/AAAAAAAAtAY/fVlIAcS5sx0/s1600/doccdwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iSngDipLvIM/U6lDwksfS5I/AAAAAAAAtAY/fVlIAcS5sx0/s1600/doccdwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cleaning the Ganges is\nimpossible unless Delhi invests in underground sewer pipelines . More than 6\nmillion people remain unconnected to any sewer line (mainly because they live\nin unauthorized housing settlements), and their waste water flows into open\ndrains.&nbsp; When the Yamuna River leaves\nDelhi, it is unable to support any but the smallest aquatic life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 19th century,\nKanpur more important than&nbsp; Delhi.&nbsp; It was a huge garrison town for the British\narmy . They needed leather boots , belts and gun holsters for both World Wars.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They fu#ked the Ganga.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When non-vegetarian Hindus refused to pollute the Ganges\nthey turned over the tannery industry to the converted beef eating Muslims. And\nMuslims do NOT care for the holiness of the Ganges.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lot of cancer on the\nganges belt below Kanpur is due to the presence of Formaldehyde in the water.\nChrome, known for its cancer-causing abilities, is used in huge amounts as are\nacids, natrium and ammonium salts.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Converting animals hide into leather&nbsp;\nrequires massive amounts of dangerous chemicals, including mineral\nsalts, formaldehyde, coal-tar derivatives, and various oils, dyes, and\nfinishes, some of them cyanide-based.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because trivalent chromium is far less\ntoxic than chromium VI, water that is contaminated with chromium VI can be treated\nwith an electron donor that converts the pollutant to its less damaging,\ntrivalent state. Bone charcoal, which is produced by burning animal bones, has\nthe ability to remove chromium from water.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other methods of removing chromium contamination from soil include\nvermiculture, which involves the use of worms to concentrate heavy metals.&nbsp; Certain forms of salt-tolerant bacteria may\nbe able to decrease chromium contamination in soil .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hexavalent chromium or Cr VI--is known to\ncause lung cancer, liver failure, kidney damage, and premature dementia..\nChromium from the sludge leaks into the river, subsoil, and groundwater - the\nprimary source of drinking water for the surrounding community.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chinese is also\nscrewing up her rivers with tanneries and have jumped to No 1 spot in leather\nexports to the west . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
