font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: River Yamuna today !</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lFmxttqOa1Q/U68Y9T_96DI/AAAAAAAAtL0/A3A_O-d0-fI/s1600/71aaab98-00e6-416f-+ndad25-f028b829d924wallpaper1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lFmxttqOa1Q/U68Y9T_96DI/AAAAAAAAtL0/A3A_O-d0-fI/s1600/71aaab98-00e6-416f-+ndad25-f028b829d924wallpaper1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While His father\nVasudeva was crossing the Yamuna with baby Lord Krishna for a safe place at\nGokula on the other bank of the river from Mathura, the Lord fell down in the\nriver, and by the dust of His lotus feet the river at once became\nsanctified.\" (Srimad Bhagavatam 1.19.6) 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: River Yamuna today ! w</span></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">hich MAD CHOOT is responsible for this?</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KHKQ_BmPCvY/U68avSywLMI/AAAAAAAAtMM/zAi-w6-4lwI/s1600/Yamuna-River-Pollutedmg-near-Taj-Mahal.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KHKQ_BmPCvY/U68avSywLMI/AAAAAAAAtMM/zAi-w6-4lwI/s1600/Yamuna-River-Pollutedmg-near-Taj-Mahal.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dams have been touted\nto prevent flooding. But exactly the reverse has happened.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dams, when overfull,\nmay release much larger than natural amounts of water in very short periods,\nsometimes causing more damaging flooding than previously known in the river\nbasin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carving out the state\nof Uttarakhand in Nov 2000 was a conspiracy to get kickbacks and mint money. The\nnew State wanted to have surplus power, which could be sold off to other States,\nby doing foeticide up in the mountains.. The Tehri Dam built on unstableground\nis a sword of Damocles hanging on India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Soviet leader\nMikhail Gorbachev's visit to India in November 1986, a Soviet economic aid\npackage for India's nuclear program suddenly fell through due to Indian\nopposition in the form of Trojan horse NGOs funded from abroad.. As a result,\nIndian Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi and Gorbachev signed an agreement on the\nTehri Dam project. Let us see how long this silted up dam lasts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The highly absorbent\nshale, customary in the valley, makes the slopes susceptible to frequent slides\u2014which\ncan trigger off a solition wave ( Tsunami ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader was\nin the habit of rewarding their stooges by selling them dry unfertile land at\nthrow away prices. &nbsp;&nbsp;Then they would make\nthose areas irrigable by building canal though them, and have these benefactors\nas their stooges for life. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp; desert lands to the west of Punjab were made\ncultivable by&nbsp; canals and were allotted\nonly to Sikhs residing in eastern Punjab at throw away prices. Check out the\nhuge and vast tract of land known as 'Nilibar' irrigated by the Chenab Canal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out the Nuevo\nrich Sikh farm owners cum farmers in the districts of Amritsar, Ludhiana,\nFerozepur and adjoining areas. The most loyal stooges of the British got the\ncanal zone lands free.&nbsp; Tracts of land\nfrom 15 acres to 500 acres were doled out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Canal networks&nbsp; were dug at Upper Bari Doab, from river Ravi\nand lower Bari Doab as well from that River; the upper Chenab canal from Chenab\nriver. The Shahpur Thal desert was irrigated by the canals taken from river Jhelum\nin upper Jhelum canal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These irrigation\nprojects covered entire lands which were previously arid deserts where not a\nblade of grass grew. These lands were made fit for agriculture from the Chenab\nriver, 430 miles of canal were dug with&nbsp;\n2293 miles of distributor channels, while 12,100 miles of the water\ncourse were taken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Financial incentives\nwere given to the most loyal British Sikh stooges. Recommendations from loyal\nSikh Maharajas were acquiesced to.&nbsp; Now\nyou know the secrets of 15 gun and 21 gun salutes and how Sikh Maharajas were found\nfit to visit king George in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These channels\nirrigated 2.6 million acres of land.&nbsp; It\nwas at the cost of 350 Lakh rupees ( a fortune in those days ) and the initial\nyearly value of the crop yielded over 900 lakh rupees -- every paise earned by\nthe loyal Sikh farmers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Posts for loyal Sikhs\nwere reserved in the Army and in the civil services to be filled exclusively by\nbaptized Sikhs, the Tat Khalsa.&nbsp;&nbsp; The\nland owning Brahmins now depended on Sikhs who became the new Zamindars. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikhs held the\nmoney,&nbsp; they were allowed to carry swords\n, they got the ear of Rothschild -&nbsp;&nbsp; they\nwere the new tough guys on the block .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is something\nknown as R.I.S. or Reservoir Induced Seismicity-- the effects of a large body\nof water on a geologic fault, in an area prone to earthquakes.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a dam is built and\nthe reservoir filled with water, the amount of pressure exerted on the earth in\nthat area changes dramatically. When the water level of a reservoir is raised,\npressure on the underlying ground increases; when the water level is lowered,\nthe pressure decreases. This fluctuation can stress the delicate balance\nbetween tectonic plates beneath the surface, possibly causing them to shift.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another\nfactor is the water itself. When the water pressure increases, more of it is\nforced into the ground, filling cracks and crevices. All of this water pressure\ncan expand those cracks and even create new, tiny ones in the rock, causing\ngreater instability below ground. What's more, as the water sinks deeper, it\ncan act as sort of a lubricant for rock plates that are being held in place by\nfriction alone. The lubrication can cause those plates to slip.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">China's leviathan\nThree Gorges Dam,is built over the Jiuwanxi and the Zigui-Badong fault lines. Reservoir-induced\nseismicity (RIS) is most likely to occur within a few years, even a decade\nafter initial filling of a dam reservoir to its highest level, due to the time\nit takes for reservoir water to penetrate deep into seismic faults and fissures\nbefore it triggers seismic activity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A 2010 study revealed seismic monitors\naround the Three Gorges Dam reservoir and in Hubei Province registered 3,429\nearthquakes between June of 2003 (when inundation of the reservoir began) and\nDecember 31, 2009: a 30-fold increase in seismic frequency over the pre-dam\nperiod.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earthquakes and water-level fluctuations in the reservoir have\nincreasingly destabilized surrounding slopes, leading to 430 landslides. China\nhas already lost 28,000 of its estimated 50,000 rivers within a few decades,\naccording to the first national water census carried out in 2013. China is a\npoor role model.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 6.3 magnitude 1967\nKoynanagar Earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore-\nand aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people\ndied and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230\nkm away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_iv-mwrD0Jo/V0mmOoAsDBI/AAAAAAABJMo/l964vF3rPEASNdjy-D9WMWfucj33884NgCLcB/s1600/river%2Bganga%2B-BB%2BAFP_0_0_0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"388\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_iv-mwrD0Jo/V0mmOoAsDBI/AAAAAAABJMo/l964vF3rPEASNdjy-D9WMWfucj33884NgCLcB/s640/river%2Bganga%2B-BB%2BAFP_0_0_0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The most ridiculous\nthing is that newspaper are reporting that anyone spitting into ganges or\ndumping waste could be looking at up to 3 years in jail or a fine of Rs 10,000 .\n&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Nonsense, with a capital N .&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Spitting in\nGanga is NOT bad for Ganga. &nbsp;Dumping of\norganic wastes like flowers , paper or lighted clay diyas with veg oil/ ghee is NOT bad for Ganga. &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Dumping non-biodegradable plastics and\nbio-accumulative toxic tannery chemicals is bad for ganga.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a river is stilled\nbehind a dam, the sediments it contains sink to the bottom of the reservoir. As\nthe sediments accumulate in the reservoir, so the dam gradually loses its\nability to store water for the purposes for which it was built. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apart from rapidly\nfilling their reservoirs, sediment\u2013filled rivers also cause headaches for dam\noperators due to the abrasion of turbines and other dam components. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The efficiency of a\nturbine is largely dependent upon the hydraulic properties of its blades, just\nas an aeroplane depends on the aerodynamic properties of its wings. A plane\nwith a damages wing willNOT be able to take off.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The erosion and cracking of the tips of\nturbine blades by water\u2013borne sand and silt considerably reduces their\ngenerating efficiency and can require expensive repairs. &nbsp;Mudslides caused by earthquakes and flash\nfloods like what happened at Uttarachal can have a dramatic and unpredictable\neffect on reservoir sedimentation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a dam reservoir is\nsilted is loses power generation capacity, loses water by evaporation and is\nthen called a WHITE ELEPHANT DAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-awfdChuPAkY/U7Fnycw57lI/AAAAAAAAtMs/Pyu48MYBqWM/s1600/downlofftad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-awfdChuPAkY/U7Fnycw57lI/AAAAAAAAtMs/Pyu48MYBqWM/s1600/downlofftad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Engineers have been\naware of the problem for centuries. &nbsp;A\ndam built in Spain in 1394 is still operating because it was built with a gate\nat its base so that silt and sediment can be flushed out . Some modern dams,\nincluding the giant Three Gorges Dam in China, incorporate similar systems. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people responsible\nfor planning white elephant dams in India must be punished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kallanai (also\nknown as the Grand Anicut) is an ancient dam built across the Kaveri River in\nTiruchirapalli District in the state of Tamil Nadu. &nbsp;&nbsp;Located\nat a distance of 15 km from Tiruchirapalli, the dam was originally constructed\nby the Chola king Karikala around the 2nd Century AD, &nbsp;and is THE oldest dam in the world which is\nstill in use. &nbsp;About 15,000 Singala\nspeaking slaves from Sri Lanka were used for labour. &nbsp;Kaveri river is clear and has NO silt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1kljNiinpog/U7HQfHMHXaI/AAAAAAAAtM8/AzOdghxx7_Y/s1600/ka-nvy-tn-2ngfjpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"454\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1kljNiinpog/U7HQfHMHXaI/AAAAAAAAtM8/AzOdghxx7_Y/s1600/ka-nvy-tn-2ngfjpg.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Three Gorges Dam of\nChina is the world's largest power station in terms of installed capacity\n(22,500 MW).&nbsp; Coupling the dam's 32 main\nturbines with two smaller generators (50 MW each) to power the plant itself,\nthe total electric generating capacity of the dam is 22,500 MW. The main\ngenerators weigh about 6,000 tonnes each and are designed to produce more than\n700 MW of power. &nbsp;On completion, the\nreservoir flooded a total area of 632 square kilometres of land.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Rhv7WmCK7uU/U7HXQKhP_WI/AAAAAAAAtNM/gXHZhfUW_J0/s1600/water_scarc,hgitnkky.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"376\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Rhv7WmCK7uU/U7HXQKhP_WI/AAAAAAAAtNM/gXHZhfUW_J0/s1600/water_scarc,hgitnkky.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydroelectric dams are\nthe number one source of methane gas emissions caused by humans. &nbsp;Methane gas contributes much more to climate\nchange then carbon dioxide. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India must NOT be arm\ntwisted by the western nations into moth balling our enormous reserves of coal.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;India has more than 310 billion metric\ntonnes of coal. &nbsp;We must use them as and\nwhen we feel like.&nbsp; &nbsp;Earth\u2019s climate is dominated by water, not\ncarbon dioxide. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the oceans warm,\nthey release CO2 into the atmosphere. Climate change is dominated by changes in\nthe water cycle, driven by solar and gravitational forces, and carbon dioxide\nplays only a minor role.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Loaded truth is\ndelivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a\nsingle agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity,\nand Muhammad in Islam. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;In\nthe Hindu tradition, by utter contrast, there is no single revelation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/the-thin-red-line-movie-review.html?showComment=1501992080230#c5420990453362286041\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_140MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT--<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT--<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT---<br />\n<br />\nDespite Typhoon Noru, 2017 is NOT yet an El Nino year. What is making Europe so warm ?<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide, a highly potent greenhouse gas is now being released from a warming Arctic<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide emissions have increased from Arctic peatlands following permafrost thaw- caused by Methane release.<br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nPARIS COP21 KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET SO THAT THE JEWS CAN BLAME CO2 AS THE VILLAIN AND MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR ( CARBON CREDIT- OFFSET ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE G20 SUMMIT IN HAMBURG 2017- ALL WORLD LEADERS ( INCLUDING MODI ) WERE IN JEW ROTHSCHILDs POCKET EXCEPT DONALD TRUMP.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK PM MODI\u2014WHAT IS THE USE OF HAVING AN ICE STATION HEMADRI AT ARCTIC? HAVE THE SCIENTISTS GONE THERE TO HAVE BOOZE AND ENJOY ?<br />\n<br />\nMore than 70 billion tons of nitrogen stocks are stored in the upper 3.5 metres of permafrost soil, a vast sum accumulated over thousands of years through the nitrogen cycle<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost stocks are more than 600 times larger than the annual nitrogen load added as GM fertiliser to soils globally<br />\n<br />\nSome of that nitrogen already exists in the form of \u201cold\u201d nitrous oxide, built up during the permafrost formation, while other mineralized nitrogen interacts with microbes to produce \u201cnew\u201d nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide that is released into the atmosphere remains in the troposphere for more than a century and then it migrates to the stratosphere, where it depletes the ozone layer. The ozone layer serves as a protective barrier absorbing solar radiation; without it the sun\u2019s ultraviolet rays would severely damage biological organisms, including humans.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough the Montreal Protocol, an international treaty signed in 1987 to protect the ozone layer, Nitrous oxide was ignored. The Zionist Jews concentrated on WEE ozone depleting items ( like refrigerants ) where they can make money out of thin air.<br />\n<br />\nLoss of nitrogen to the atmosphere may also reduce plant biomass, further contributing to climate change.<br />\n<br />\nIf nitrogen is lost to the atmosphere, plant growth won't be able to compensate for carbon being lost from permafrost soils<br />\n<br />\nThe most alarming phenomenon in the Arctic is the loss of the highly reflective snow and ice cover, known as the albedo..<br />\n<br />\nHigh nitrous oxide saturations were recently observed in productive shallow Arctic shelf waters following significant reduction in sea ice cover..<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide is produced in the ocean water column and sediments by two pathways. The first is in oxygen-rich conditions in which ammonium is converted to nitrate, creating nitrous oxide as a byproduct. The second occurs in deoxygenated sediments where nitrous oxide is produced in an intermediate stage between the conversion of nitrate to nitrogen gas.<br />\n<br />\nThe loss of sea ice cover in Arctic shelf waters has resulted in increased sunlight absorption, fueling phytoplankton growth. Following phytoplankton death, organic material is remineralized to ammonium, which can be converted to nitrate and ultimately produce nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nWhat happens in the Arctic doesn\u2019t stay in the Arctic ( unlike the Cricket team dressing room politics )<br />\n<br />\nIndians were the first to use BIOCHAR for agriculture . It converts agricultural waste into a soil enhancer that can hold carbon, boost food security, and increase soil biodiversity, and discourage deforestation. The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water.<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years. Just 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil.<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_140BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_138MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nOur hospitals are full die to the effects of NITROSAMINES and EVIL PHARMA is laughing all the way to the bank with \u201cAlice in Wonderland \u201c PM Modi clapping from the sidelines<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nRead all 6 pats of the post below--<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT OUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS TO EXPOUND THE IMPORTANCE OF HAVING HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND BASICS ABOUT GRAOUND WATER .<br />\n<br />\nOrganic soil forms can be further divided into \"recalcitrant carbon\" or resistant to decay, like humus, and \"labile carbon,\" where the carbon is both bioavailable (in the form of easily degraded compounds such as oils, sugars and alcohols) and physically accessible to microbes (not bound up with minerals).<br />\n<br />\nThe organic carbon pool includes both the living bodies and the dead, decomposing bodies of bacteria, fungi, insects and worms, along with plant debris and manure<br />\n<br />\nIndian topsoil was 6 feet deep\u2014unlike other nations of this planet having a few inches deep top soil.<br />\n<br />\nModern, chemically-based GM agriculture depletes soil carbon..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS GOOD FOR ISRAEL IS NOT GOOD FOR INDIA\u2014 JEW DARLING PM MODI PLEASE NOTE. WE WONT ALLOW YOUR MANN KE TAMANNA \u201cKOSHER COMPUTER COW\u201d IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nSoil building is the product of a self-reinforcing, positive feedback loop. But soil decline is also a self-reinforcing loop that can result in catastrophic soil loss.<br />\n<br />\nNitrogen fertilizers combined with tillage accelerate microbial respiration, burning up soil carbon faster than it is replaced. Due to the loss of organic carbon reservoirs, many soils have become nearly lifeless substrates that must be continually fed with irrigation water, mineral nutrients and pesticides to produce a crop. Although productive in the short term, this practice is not sustainable<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool.<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT COMMIES AND WHITE JEWS TO DRIVE OUR EDUCATION<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. The surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients.<br />\nbalanced compost, with the optimum C:N ratio, will contain lots of humus. However, if there is not enough stable carbon (from wood, straw or other lignin sources), then the easily degradable sugars, fats and proteins will be completely consumed by microbes leaving very little substrate behind<br />\n<br />\nBoth biochar and compost increases cation exchange capacity (CEC - the ability to hold onto and transfer nutrient cations: ammonium, calcium, magnesium, and potassium)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThey supports soil microbial life and biodiversity and helps plants resist diseases and pathogens. They add humus carbon to the soil carbon pool, reducing the atmospheric carbon pool\u2014and increases soil water holding capacity. In coastal areas they help plants grow better in high salt situations.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate. Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.. Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_138MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_138BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_138B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8131227607787448028\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_139M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KALI THE WIFE OF SHIVA IS DARK ENERGY OF THE COSMOS --SHE REPRESENTS THE BLACK HOLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3581056505277055274\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_113M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_16.html?showComment=1526561833678#c3581056505277055274\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 17, 2018 at 6:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.newyorker.com/news/dispatch/how-indias-welfare-revolution-is-starving-citizens<br />\n<br />\nBENAMI MEDIA AND FAKE NEWS..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS A FOOD SURPLUS NATION.. 40% OF PRODUCED FOOD GOES WASTE...<br />\n<br />\nWE CAN REDUCE THE WASTE TO 3% IF WE ADOPT OZONE..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE NO HUNGER DEATHS IN INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT-- WE MUST STOP FAKE NEWS AND FINE THE DESH DROHI MEDIA BARONS ...<br />\n<br />\nSHUT DOWN DESH DROHI FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">GREEN REVOLUTION HAS HARMED FOOD PRODUCTION... OUR HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL WAS REPLACED BY CHEMICAL LADEN WATER THIRSTY SOIL .. SOIL AEREATING EARTH WORMS HAVE DISAPPEARED ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nLegend has it that 6000 years ago , Lord Parashurama CREATED snake groves in Kerala to increase Humus acid in Keralas\u2019s top soil. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe gardeners job is to increase the amount of humus in soil. \u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Think of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WE CAN STOP FARMER SUICIDES..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\nHUMUS IN TOP SOIL GAVE INDIA PRICELESS FLORA FOLLOWING THE GOLDEN MEAN..<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026. 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nSnakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe humic substance contains various functional groups of carboxylic, carbonyl, phenolic, alcoholic with higher molecular weight of 40,000 to 70,000 and higher cation exchange capacity (100-130 meq/100 gm). Lignite contains more of humic acid\u2026..---<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026.. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026\u2026. Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026\u2026\u2026The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026.. Better soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.While these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_171M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534063449317#c6342733295400532677\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 12, 2018 at 2:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_171MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>RUSH RUSH RUSH..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WARNING--.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A SCARE IN KERALA THAT THERE ARE EARTH QUAKE TREMORS , CAUSING CRACKS ON HOME WALLS AND COMPOUND WALLS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE CRACKS ( WHEN FAR AWAY FROM A DAM ) HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH EARTH QUAKES ..IT HAS TO DO WITH INSUFFICIENT FOUNDATION OF THE STRUCTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">I WARN THE KERALA CM -- DO NOT ALLOW IDUKKI DAM RESERVOIR TO GO BEYOND 2402 FEET HEIGHT\u2026 TAKE THIS FROM A MAN WHO IS AN EXPERT ON WATER..</span><br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS BEEN BUILT WITH INBUILT DE-SILTING FACILITIES..<br />\n<br />\nAS A RESULT WHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED, THE STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGES INCREASE THE WATER LEVEL ARBITRARILY, LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT MULLAPERIAR.. ALL THEY DELIBERATE ON IS IF THE DAM WALL S STRONG ENOUGH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO TAKE TECHNICAL DECISIONS ( PIL BASED ) ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN WATER LEVEL IS RAISED , IMMEDIATELY WATER SURFACE AREA IN THE SILTED RESERVOIR INCREASES --INUNDATING MORE LAND AROUND.. MORE SURFACE AREA MEANS MORE EVAPORATION OF WATER HELD BY THE DAM .<br />\n<br />\nTHE MORE DANGEROUS THING IS THIS CAN CAUSE LANDSLIDES AND SOLITION WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WHICH CAN CRASH INTO THE DAM WALL BREACHING IT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">CRITICAL MESSAGE --- NOW ABOUT TREMORS NEAR DAMS ..</span><br />\n<br />\nGOD NEVER INTENDED MAN TO BUILD DAMS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN HUGE DAMS ARE BUILT WITH HIGH WATER LEVELS IN THE RESERVOIR IT CAUSE GEOPATHIC STRESS WHICH MAKES THE AREA TREMOR PRONE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">RESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED RIS ( RESERVOIR INDUCED SEISMICITY)...THIS SUBJECTS HAS BEEN STUDIES AS POST DISASTER REACTIONS \u2013 AND NEVER PROACTIVELY BEFORE BUILDING A DAM..<br /><br />80% OF INDIAs LARGE DAMS ARE PRONE TO RIS \u2013 AS THEY HAVE BEEN BUILT WITHOUT PROPER GEOLOGICAL STUDIES ON UNSUITABLE AREAS \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nReservoirs can both increase the frequency of earthquakes in areas of already high seismic activity and cause earthquakes to happen in areas previously thought to be seismically inactive.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA---<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nThe 1979 MORVI DAM BURST ( rajkot , gujarat ) is in the Guinness book of world records.<br />\n<br />\nHas India ever investigated the reason for 26,000 deaths at Morvi due to induced seismicity ?<br />\n<br />\nHas India investigates the 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir.<br />\n<br />\nIn dam water reservoirs, the crushing weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">God has made huge NATURAL lakes in safe areas --unlike man's ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.</span><br />\nSignificant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake. When dam reservoirs are filled or drained, induced seismicity can occur immediately or with a small time lag.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535264994347#c2766037549176043609\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 11:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_57MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWAS SARASWATI RIVER A MORE HOLY RIVER THAN GANGES<br />\n<br />\nYES!<br />\n<br />\nAYURVEDA USED SARASWATI RIVER WATER BEFORE THE RIVER WENT DRY..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD AXOLOTLS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html<br />\n<br />\nGANGES RIVER HAS MACROPHAGES<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br />\n<br />\nAxolotl is a species of aquatic salamander. Unlike humans, it has the \u201csuperpower\u201d of regenerating its limbs, spinal cord, heart, and other organs..<br />\n<br />\nYoung frogs are known to regrow limbs, though they lose this ability when they change from tadpoles to adult frogs. On the other hand, the axolotl retains it throughout its entire life, making it unique among vertebrates<br />\n<br />\nHumans have also been known to regenerate the tips of the fingers, including the bone and skin. I once lost the tip of my left forefinger on the ship--it has regrown fully.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF CHEMICAL POLLUTION FOR TANNERIES, GANGES MACROPHAGES HAVE LOST THEIR ANCIENT POWERS OF REGENERATION..<br />\n<br />\nInjecting a drug to get rid of macrophages in an axolotl\u2019s limb before amputation leads to the accumulation of scar tissue instead of regrowth..<br />\n<br />\nThis scarring, which happens when a protein called collagen becomes disordered, is a normal part of wound healing in humans, but it is unusual in axolotls. This result suggests that macrophages are essential for regeneration<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls stay 'babies' for their whole lives. Axolotls are neotenic creatures meaning they achieve sexual maturity without losing any of their larval features<br />\n<br />\nIf an axolotl is given a shot of iodine, it will experience a rush of hormones that triggers the animal's growth processes, and it will \"grow up\" and resemble a mature tiger salamander, their closest relative.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, this is not the axolotl's natural state. \"Grown-up\" axolotls are typically listless and die about a year after the injection.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls can regenerate pretty much any body part. A number of amphibians are capable of regenerating limbs, but axolotls take this habit up a notch by regenerating jaws, spinal cords, skin and even portions of their brain. Axolotls can also receive organ transplants and will not reject the new organ.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls have a genome 10 times the size of the human genome..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0GJOjfYn74<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c782687426727886869\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_188M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535892123070#c782687426727886869\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 6:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSOMEONE ASKED ME-- IF WE MANUALLY DE-SILT DAM RESERVOIRS , WHAT IS THE HARM?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANGES IS NOT A HOLY RIVER ANY MORE AS THE \"LIVING\" PART OF IT LIES AT THE BOTTOM OD DAM RESERVOIRS UPSTREAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nFOR MILLIONS OF YEARS LIVING WATER FLOWED DOWN GANGES RIVER.. THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br />\n<br />\nON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br />\n<br />\nI IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br />\n<br />\nBONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nHEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. THE ONLY WAY TODAY TO RETARD BRAIN DEGRADATION IS TO CONSUME HALF A TEASPOON OF FRESH GOMUTRA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DUNG OF HUMPED COW HAS BEEN USED FOR MILLENNIUMS TO KEEP AWAY NEGATIVE ENERGIES AND HAS BEEN USED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR HOLY GANGES WATER WHICH CONTAIN NANO SILVER COLLOIDS AND BACTERIOPHAGES ..
