Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "852", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/542835792817504593/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8852252414726341903", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2014-06-15T06:28:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-06-16T09:20:44+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDAyODkwNjQ0NDkwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/the-dipping-freekick-of-juninho-and.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8852252414726341903", "title": "THE DIPPING FREE KICK OF JUNINHO AND PIRLO - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;WORLD CUP SOCCER 2014 ITALY VS ENGLAND -- PIRLO'S&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">DIPPING&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;FREE KICK&nbsp;</span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I just finished\nwatching the Italy Vs England World cup soccer match 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the time came for\nItaly to take a free kick , I knew Pirlo would execute the Juninho patented\nlate dipping free kick .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He executed it to near\nperfection as seen in the video below--but it hit the cross bar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/iHK-Tt1-Mk4/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/iHK-Tt1-Mk4&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/iHK-Tt1-Mk4&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">England's goalkeeper\nhad zilch clue as to what happened. After the match Hart complimented\nPirlo--this is something which rarely happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/WFbxcEI0rC4/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/WFbxcEI0rC4&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/WFbxcEI0rC4&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pirlo was one the\narchitects of Italy\u2019s 2006 World Cup title, helped AC Milan to two Champions\nLeague trophies and has won the last three Serie A championships with Juventus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pirlo does NOT shy away\nfrom accepting that he learnt this dipping free kick from Juninho.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Super talented\nmidfielder Juninho played for French club Lyon from 2001-09, and Pirlo used to\nstudy his dead ball kicks . Juninho scored a French-record 44 free-kick goals\nwith Lyon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pirlo dedicated an\nentire chapter in his recently published autobiography \u201c<i>Penso quindi gioco</i>\u201d \u2014\n\u201cI think therefore I play\u201d \u2014 to his study of Juninho's style of late dipping\nfree kicks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pirlo wrote in-depth on\nfree-kicks in his recently released autobiography, specifically Juninho's\nstyle.&nbsp; Pirlo can use both the inside and\noutside of his foot for free kicks and his consistency is second only to\nJuninho.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe ball needed to be\nkicked from underneath, using the first three toes, keeping the foot as\nstraight as possible and in that manner the ball remained still in the air but\nthen at a certain point dipped down rapidly into the goal,\u201d Pirlo wrote. \u201cWhen\nI execute it exactly like I want to there\u2019s no wall that can stop it.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Juninho was\nUNSUNG--while a lesser Beckham was praised to the skies by ignorant soccer\npundits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Pirlo</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O6U32YCyzqE/U5zuDNbH0VI/AAAAAAAAs1A/N4PWFglFIQc/s1600/article-2654408-1E96994000000578-36_634x684.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O6U32YCyzqE/U5zuDNbH0VI/AAAAAAAAs1A/N4PWFglFIQc/s1600/article-2654408-1E96994000000578-36_634x684.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"592\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The method Juninho uses\nfor long-range free kicks is frequently \"knuckle balling,\" where the\nball has almost no spinning motion during flight. A successful knuckle ball will\n\"move\" or \"wobble\" in the air unpredictably, making it\ndifficult for the goal keeper to save<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below : Juninho</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Sk-eYIGua5I/U5zu3CS6bDI/AAAAAAAAs1Y/R6ePvxttmKk/s1600/article-2654408-01C42B9E00000fff4B0-40_634x438.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Sk-eYIGua5I/U5zu3CS6bDI/AAAAAAAAs1Y/R6ePvxttmKk/s1600/article-2654408-01C42B9E00000fff4B0-40_634x438.jpg\" height=\"442\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><i><br /></i></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antonio Augusto Ribeiro\nReis Jr. or Juninho Pernambucano, is the greatest free kick specialist of all\ntime in my book.&nbsp;&nbsp; Juninho led Olympique\nLyonnais to seven consecutive Ligue 1 titles before leaving the club in 2009.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He retired from international\nfootball after the 2006 World Cup.&nbsp;\nJuninho had made his debut for the Brazilian national team in 1999.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Juninho is said to be\ngifted with the ability to make the ball turn direction twice while in air and\nhad a free kick accuracy of 97% while he played at Lyon, which is the highest\nfree kick accuracy ever achieved by any player..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Juninho and Pirlo</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oB6xKlx_i58/U5zu_fzPrVI/AAAAAAAAs1g/YQqGWfW8lKg/s1600/article-2654408-1EAA87B8000005fff78-847_634x380.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oB6xKlx_i58/U5zu_fzPrVI/AAAAAAAAs1g/YQqGWfW8lKg/s1600/article-2654408-1EAA87B8000005fff78-847_634x380.jpg\" height=\"382\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cIt was really neat. He\ntalked about my book and came to thank me,\u201d Pirlo said. \u201cI think he was just as\nexcited to meet me as I was to meet him.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cI think on shorter\nkicks Pirlo is better. But maybe from greater distances I was,\u201d Juninho said\nafter exchanging shirts with Pirlo. &nbsp;\u201cBut Pirlo has won everything his career,\nand his results tell everything. &nbsp;He\u2019s one of the most complete midfielders of\nhis generation.\u201d</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a disgrace that\nJuninho has never won the FIFA World Player of the Year, it just shows how\ndisgraceful these awards are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Juninho's style of freekick by impacting at\nthe ball valve taking has been adapted by Cristiano Ronaldo too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most balls have a dead\nspot where the inflation vale is located. If you kick it right, you'll get no\nspin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, due to\nCoriolis forces, the ball will either wobble or dip and totally confuse the\ngoalkeeper as what Pirlo did to Hart--just 30 minutes ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Menopause is the final\ncessation of a woman's reproductive ability.&nbsp;\nIt is a natural change that typically occurs in women in their early\n50s, signaling the end of the fertile phase.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: Are PMS women good rulers ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0w_kHbRKZ3o/U5bFgyvBJ1I/AAAAAAAAsys/jl6x7JzO9lM/s1600/Symptoms-offgfgf-Menopause.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0w_kHbRKZ3o/U5bFgyvBJ1I/AAAAAAAAsys/jl6x7JzO9lM/s1600/Symptoms-offgfgf-Menopause.png\" height=\"470\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The transition from\nreproductive to a non-reproductive state occurs over a number of years, and is\na consequence of biological aging.&nbsp;&nbsp; The\ndate of menopause is the day after the final episode of menstrual flow finishes.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-K8-6wBeg9bQ/U5bFCMhsvBI/AAAAAAAAsyk/0RCskmhTdeM/s1600/estrogen-dfgdominance.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">The menopause transition, and post menopause itself, is a natural life change,\nnot a disease state or a disorder. Along with the decline in\ntestosterone, some men experience symptoms that include fatigue, weakness,\ndepression, and sexual problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">NITRIC OXIDE IN\nAGNIHOTRA, YOGA, AYURVEDA AND THE VEDAS VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide was\nproclaimed \u201cMolecule of the Year\u201d in 1992. And this magic molecule ( which our\nMaharishis knew about thousands of years ago) &nbsp;fetched the 1998 Nobel Prize in Physiology .\nIt went jointly to Robert F. Furchgott, Louis J. Ignarro and Ferid Murad for discovering\nthe magic signalling molecule.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-p9fPPAH1iwE/U5WJ6wChhcI/AAAAAAAAswg/mP2HSsncf24/s1600/imjjiiages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-p9fPPAH1iwE/U5WJ6wChhcI/AAAAAAAAswg/mP2HSsncf24/s1600/imjjiiages.jpg\" height=\"168\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When ancient Indians\ndiscovered something is was just dreaming of a morbid mind \u2014but when some white\nmen re-invent the same wheel it is scientific discovery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Achieving and\nmaintaining an erection depends on blood flow to the dong. &nbsp;Normally, when a man is sexually aroused,\nchemical interactions in the body cause blood to fill the tissue inside the\npenis and it hardens and becomes erect.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viagra assists\nthis process by relaxing the muscles around arterial blood vessels and\nincreasing the flow of blood to the penis.&nbsp;\nViagra is the trade name for the drug sildenafil citrate.&nbsp; It works by relaxing the smooth muscle lining\nof certain blood vessels, causing them to expand and fill with blood. In males,\nthis typically results in penile erection<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHEA is a\n\u201cparent hormone\u201d produced by the adrenal glands near the kidneys and in the\nliver. In men, DHEA is also secreted by the testes. DHEA levels seem to go down\nas people get older. DHEA levels also seem to be lower in people with certain\nconditions like depression.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHEA circulates\nin the bloodstream mainly as the sulfated form, DHEAS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The half-life of DHEAS is 9 hours, whereas\nthe half-life of DHEA is only 20 minutes.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHEAS is\ncoverted to DHEA and then to sex hormones in body tissues. Humans have\nconsiderably higher levels of DHEA than any other species.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sex hormones are\nproduced almost exclusively by the ovary &amp; testes of most mammals, whereas for\nhumans (and to a lesser extent some other primates) about half of the sex\nhormones come from the gonads ( ovary/ testes ) and about half is synthesized\non an as-needed basis from DHEA in peripheral tissues (breast, prostate, brain,\nmuscle, liver, etc.). &nbsp;DHEA is a steroid\n( not an anabolic steroid ) found in Chembu ( Colacasia ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHEA reaches its\nhighest levels in the blood at age 22, and drops progressively with age\nthereafter.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>DHEA has been\nshown to have the following effects:</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anti-cancer<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adequate DHEA\nlevels help combat the symptoms that come with metabolic syndrome such as low\nsex drive and fatigue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human adrenals\n-- besides making DHEA -- they also manufacture cortisol ( due to stress ) ,\nwhich is in direct competition with DHEA for production. In other words, when\ncortisol production is high, especially for prolonged periods of time, your\nadrenals can actually wear out, and DHEA production will necessarily\nsuffer.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adrenal\nexhaustion from coping with chronic stress means your adrenal glands are\noverworked from manufacturing cortisol, and they simply can't produce enough\nDHEA to support a healthy hormonal balance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You feel exhausted, often\ndepressed, and your muscle tone decreases while body fat increases (cortisol\ntells your body to store fat).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inflammation&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clearly it pays\nhealthy dividends to reduce stress in your life, not only to reduce cortisol\nproduction, but also to ensure that your body has adequate adrenal strength to\nkeep your DHEA levels optimal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The imbalance of\neven one hormone causes imbalance in other hormones and leads to a domino\neffect of sorts. Men may not experience all of the above andropause symptoms,\nbut instead commonly experience a combination of symptoms. While these symptoms\nare signs of andropause, they may also be symptoms of other conditions like\nadrenal fatigue and poor thyroid health.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only a test will\ntell you for certain what your body's DHEA levels are, but if you're feeling\ntired and overwhelmed, have low libido, and find your mood suffering or even\nexperience depression regularly, there is a strong chance that your body is not\nproducing enough DHEA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the West the\nmale menopause candidates have supplemented hormones over a long period of time\n. Their bodies got tricked into suspending its own DHEA production, and even\nshutting down your adrenal glands, which can lead to disastrous health\nconsequences. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if you\nswallow steroid hormones you seriously distort their natural metabolism.\nSwallowed hormones encounter potent stomach acids, and the hormones that\nsurvive this assault then move to your liver where they will be further broken\ndown. Your liver screens all molecules that enter your blood stream, passing\nsome onward, modifying or detoxifying others, and rejecting a few.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This routing of\norally swallowed hormones is in sharp contrast to the way nature intended them\nto be distributed to your tissues. So for men, the ideal delivery system for\nDHEA is in cream form, through the as$hole\u2014if at all they insist on being\nslaves to evil Pharma..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHEA is sold as a\nsupplement, but it is a powerful hormone that can change into other hormones\nsuch as estrogen and testosterone once in the body. Decreasing DHEA levels are\nclosely associated with a number of age-related diseases and disabilities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">If aging men and women can restore their\nDHEA to levels produced in their youth, youthful health and vigor will also be\nrestored. DHEA increases the body\u2019s ability to transform food into energy and\nburn off excess fat. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DHEA is secreted\nthroughout the body during sex.&nbsp; DHEA reduces risk factors associated with age-related heart disease and\nimproves blood vessels by stimulating the linings of arteries to produce nitric\noxide, a substance that relaxes arterial tension.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3KOGI4vt-7g/U5X4rMTAKcI/AAAAAAAAsx8/vYLzm63FkKM/s1600/picgyu2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3KOGI4vt-7g/U5X4rMTAKcI/AAAAAAAAsx8/vYLzm63FkKM/s1600/picgyu2.jpg\" height=\"310\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Progressively\nincreasing number of people today complain of a lack of energy, unexplained\nweight gain, poor mood, depression and insomnia. Some of the contributing\nfactors can be a poor diet, lack of exercise, stress that goes unchecked and\nadrenal glands functioning sub-optimally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testosterone\nlevels fall by taking undesirable medication , poor diet, excessive alcohol\nconsumption, illness, lack of sleep, lack of sex, stress , allergies, GM foods\n, A1 toxic milk, plastics leaching into food / water etc.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-THQgYaahbNI/U5bHMEgDA-I/AAAAAAAAszI/rs5UUQxzn_Q/s1600/imtytyages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-THQgYaahbNI/U5bHMEgDA-I/AAAAAAAAszI/rs5UUQxzn_Q/s1600/imtytyages.jpg\" height=\"246\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much of the\ncurrent popular interest in the concept of andropause ( male menopause ) has\nbeen fueled by the book Male Menopause, written by Jed Diamond, a person of\npoor perception, who is really NOT qualified to write a book on this subject .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testosterone\nlevels (T-levels) decline gradually as humans age. Unlike females going through\nmenopause, the decline in testosterone in men is gradual. What Jed Diamond does\nNOT know is that men\u2019s functioning is not impaired solely by a loss of\ntestosterone, but by a loss of estrogen as well. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen \u2014 the\nfemale hormone \u2014 is needed by men, too. &nbsp;Muscle\nsize and strength depended on testosterone, body-fat mass depended on estrogen,\nand both hormones were needed to maintain normal sex drive and performance. &nbsp;As testosterone levels go down as men get\nolder, estrogen levels go down, too. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QRzD603P5Lo/U5X5TEGjxlI/AAAAAAAAsyE/QIkRBn3_R2c/s1600/doljbgwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QRzD603P5Lo/U5X5TEGjxlI/AAAAAAAAsyE/QIkRBn3_R2c/s1600/doljbgwnload.jpg\" height=\"463\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Estrogen\nactually comes from testosterone in men. And when it goes down, we have two\nproblems then with the low testosterone and low estrogen. &nbsp;It affects sex drive, muscle, fat.&nbsp; Estrogen is not all bad for men, but it needs\nto be in balance. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both estrogen\nand testosterone levels can be checked through simple blood tests. Healthy\nratios of estrogen and testosterone are critical for men to maintain good\nenergy, stamina, muscle mass, bone density and to prevent many chronic diseases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.. As teenagers,\nmen have high levels of testosterone and low levels of estrogen. As they age,\ntestosterone levels in men decrease while their estrogen levels increase<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men with higher\ntestosterone levels have more estrogen, compared to men with low testosterone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The normal\ndecline of testosterone levels that comes with age is not believed to be the\ncause of male menopause. If it were, every man would experience it, and this is\nnot the case.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a woman\narrives at menopause her menstrual periods stop and she is no longer able to\nbecome pregnant.&nbsp; Her levels of female\nhormones - estrogen and progesterone - decline considerably. Menopause involves\na sudden and dramatic decrease in estrogen that marks the end of a woman's\nability to conceive a child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What will surprise many\npeople is that loss of sexual desire in men with low testosterone is due to\nlack of estrogen.&nbsp; Testosterone is the\nmain male sex hormone. Men's bodies convert some of it into estrogen, and levels\nof both decline with age. While some of a man's estrogen is converted from\ntestosterone, some is converted from fat cells. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In obese men the\nproblem is that there is too much estrogen in the system, which leads to a\ndisbalance of the hormones in the male with a relative lack of testosterone.\nOverweight and obese men produce significant amounts of estrogen through\naromatase located in the fatty tissue. Aromatase converts testosterone and\nother male type hormones, called androgens, into estrogen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive levels of\nestrogen cause breast growth, muscle weakness, lead to abdominal fat\naccumulation, heart disease and strokes. One of the advantages of doing saliva\nhormone tests of estrogen and testosterone is that you can calculate directly\nthe ratios of these two hormones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testosterone\ntherapy is available in West in the forms of injections, gels, lotions,\npatches, capsules and tablets and is now a multi million dollar business . A\nlot of people have developed prostrate gland cancer and have got debilitating\nstrokes.&nbsp; &nbsp;A PSA blood test identifies a man's risk for\nprostate cancer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other risks\nassociated with hormone supplementation, particularly with injections, include\nthe risk of stroke, an increase in liver toxicity and breast development.\nIronically, testosterone supplementation also shuts down the production of\nsperm\u2014so you are basically firing blanks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testosterone is\nalso known as androgen, and many doctors prefer the term \"andropause\"\nfor this male condition.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is important\nto be aware that many of these male menopause symptoms are a normal part of\nageing; others can be caused by a variety of factors.&nbsp; Many men who experience these age-related\nsymptoms have unhealthy lifestyles; they may smoke or drink too much alcohol,\ndo not exercise and are often overweight. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These lifestyle\nfactors may cause illnesses such as diabetes, heart disease, high cholesterol\nand depression. Some andropause symptoms can also mimic thyroid disorders,\nliver disease or kidney failure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\">Testosterone replacement therapy (TRT) is the male equivalent of hormone replacement therapy (HRT) in women.&nbsp; Vitamins C and E and<b> zinc</b> can help increase testosterone production.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yh9ir8bXUtc/U5bH3N2rd0I/AAAAAAAAszQ/qgyA7b0V5Rw/s1600/imfggages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yh9ir8bXUtc/U5bH3N2rd0I/AAAAAAAAszQ/qgyA7b0V5Rw/s1600/imfggages.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc is\nimportant for ageing men because of its role in maintaining prostate health,\ntestosterone levels and overall sexual health. &nbsp;Since our bodies don't\nproduce zinc, a daily intake is beneficial to ensure healthy levels of this\ncritical mineral.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc is essential to\nsperm production, and most men can blame decreased semen volume and\ntestosterone levels on low zinc supplies. Sperm motility refers to the strength\nand the endurance of sperm cells to swim toward the egg in order to fertilize\nit. And low sperm motility is one of the main causes of male infertility.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mEXdQAZLNcM/U5XseEPG2jI/AAAAAAAAsxM/SQgS1dc0iAE/s1600/spermxs-chart.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mEXdQAZLNcM/U5XseEPG2jI/AAAAAAAAsxM/SQgS1dc0iAE/s1600/spermxs-chart.gif\" height=\"260\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sperm motility\nis measured differently than sperm count. Instead of a total count, sperm\nmotility reflects the percentage of the sperm that are moving forward. If you\nhave a sperm motility count below 50 percent, vitamin and nutrition\ndeficiencies -- including inadequate levels of zinc -- could be part of the\nproblem. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While zinc is\nfound in every organ, tissue and cell in the human body, in males, the prostate\nhas more zinc than any other tissue except bone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As men get\nolder, they tend to exercise less and their diets change as well, often causing\nthem to fall short of the recommended daily allowance of zinc. Men who don't\nhave significant levels of zinc in their diets tend to have higher instances of\nenlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia, or BPH) and prostatis (an\ninflammation of the prostate). They also have higher prostate cancer rates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc supplements\ncan help guard against hair loss in men who don't eat a balanced diet. The\nsuggested dosage for hair loss is 50 to 100 milligrams a day, and zinc\nsupplements can be found at your pharmacy or a health food store.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3BYPD60nFlU/U5Xt7s24OXI/AAAAAAAAsxY/uJjxoQZfN8Q/s1600/imagxsdses.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3BYPD60nFlU/U5Xt7s24OXI/AAAAAAAAsxY/uJjxoQZfN8Q/s1600/imagxsdses.jpg\" height=\"264\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc has also\nbeen found to improve the antioxidant capabilities of the liver, as well as\nboost a main metal detoxifying compound called metallothionein, or MT. Low MT\nlevels sensitize the liver to potential damage. By stabilizing the\ngastrointestinal tract, MT can help keep inflammation to a minimum .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly,\nalcohol consumption can drive down the zinc levels in the thyroid, which can\nresult in a host of medical issues, including compromised thyroid performance\nand subsequent weight gain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies\nproduce molecules that can damage cells, called free radicals. Antioxidants\nsuch as zinc help neutralize these potentially dangerous free radicals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the balance between free radicals and antioxidants is upset,\nit can contribute to developing cancer and heart disease, as well as\nage-related diseases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc also not\nonly increases the production of white blood cells that fight infection, but\nalso helps them fight more aggressively. It also increases killer cells that\nfight against cancer and helps white cells release more antibodies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc\nincreases the number of infection-fighting T-cells, especially in elderly\npeople who are often deficient in zinc and whose immune system may weaken with\nage . &nbsp;Zinc is a key mineral that helps produce thyroid-releasing hormones, or\nTRH, in your brain, which then signals your pituitary to make thyroid-stimulating\nhormone (TSH). &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In men, the failure to do this also results in low testosterone\nlevels.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alcohol use can exacerbate this situation. If you're\ndealing with low thyroid symptoms and consume any amount of alcohol, consider\ntaking supplemental zinc.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-niu-X_gEcEg/U5XvQlzh3HI/AAAAAAAAsxk/D_jH0Kgz5pY/s1600/ifggmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-niu-X_gEcEg/U5XvQlzh3HI/AAAAAAAAsxk/D_jH0Kgz5pY/s1600/ifggmages.jpg\" height=\"286\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc is required at the intracellular level to help the thyroid nuclear receptors\nattach and drive the reading of the DNA genetic code. &nbsp;A primary\nfunction of thyroid hormone is to help put the genetic code into action, which\nunderscores the importance of maintaining proper zinc levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very act of\nexercising -- from weight training to running to raking the lawn -- puts our\nmuscles under stress. We literally break them down, on a cellular level, when\nwe use them. While at rest, our muscles grow back bigger and stronger. Zinc is\na key component in this process, from providing proper structure to cells and\nproteins to helping us get the rest that the process requires.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span lang=\"EN-IN\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muscles at work expend considerable energy, leading to the production of free\nradicals. font-size: large;\">The human health also\ndepends upon how well the lymphatic system performs. The lymphatic system in\nyour body is a series of connected nodes, ducts and organs that play a vital\npart in your immune system. is what the most recent study published in\nthe Journal of Alzheimer\u2019s Disease&nbsp; says,\n-- after evaluating the influence of oxidative stress on testosterone\u2019s\ntypically protective effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: white; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testosterone stimulates the production of red blood cells and it makes\nyour blood thicker, which increases your risk for a heart attack or stroke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The side effects of testosterone therapy include&nbsp; enlargement of the prostate gland, and\natrophy of the testicles, low sperm count, liver damage, sleep\napnea, acne , tuft titties etc among many other side effects. </span></b><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: white; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is ABSOLUTELY essential to have a prostate exam and PSA blood test\nprior to receiving testosterone replacement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: white; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men who are obese often have low testosterone, and this is not a reason\nto take testosterone therapy. Losing weight is a much healthier and effective\nsolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: white; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The symptoms of male menopause are just a normal part of aging and a\nnormal part of life.&nbsp; Testosterone\ntherapy is not the fountain of youth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: white; So what, the undiluted true depiction is what\nmakes this book great.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lennie Small is a\nmentally challenged but physically strong man who travels with George Milton ,\nand is his constant companion.&nbsp; He dreams\nof \"living off the fatta' the lan'\"&nbsp;\nand being able to tend to rabbits.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His love for soft things conspires against him-- he is unaware of his\nown great physical strength, and eventually , this becomes his undoing.&nbsp; George Milton is quick-witted man who is\ndimwit Lennie's guardian and best friend.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sc5kQdguDgg/U4b7T83wEuI/AAAAAAAAspI/5AzIaJ_R_Ig/s1600/downloaFHYd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sc5kQdguDgg/U4b7T83wEuI/AAAAAAAAspI/5AzIaJ_R_Ig/s1600/downloaFHYd.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"224\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then much later in\nlife I saw a Malayalam movie SOORYA MANASAM where Malayalam megastar Mammotty did the honours\nfor Lennie , the retard. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of stroking soft rabbits like Lennie, &nbsp;Mammotty talks often about his favourite dish\nPUTTU AND KADALA which he loves to eat.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i>Below: &nbsp;In the Malayalam movie George is substituted by Lennie's mother.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above: &nbsp;Probably our great self confessed intellectual Mani, can add a moral to Super Panchatantra , to save his own life ?</i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before I launch into\nthe story line, I must give a brief introduction of the main character , a\ndimwit named Lennie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lennie, in Steinbeck's\nscheme, is the &nbsp;symbolic essence of the American worker, &nbsp;the man who labors\nendlessly and asks for nothing because he never quite realizes all he's giving.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Archie comics you must\nhave read about the Moose- Dilton combo on the beach. &nbsp;Well Lennie is Moose \u2013sort of . &nbsp;&nbsp;Moose is NOT a retard, Lennie is one.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cLUM0uzsV9E/U4i_MjJJ4MI/AAAAAAAAsro/cLLWOMay2Xk/s1600/downlobbjad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cLUM0uzsV9E/U4i_MjJJ4MI/AAAAAAAAsro/cLLWOMay2Xk/s1600/downlobbjad.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"218\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lennie Small, is a man\nof large stature and great strength but limited mental abilities\u2014 <i>upar ka\nthalla bilkul khali hai , uska </i>!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: They made a Hollywood movie-- Lennie the lumbering simpleton , is to the right .</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QM6r-ApCsyU/U4ihGbOoSoI/AAAAAAAAsqU/sCMPjMPRxUA/s1600/ceHUykgMyRGe8LINJ.0fwiOeFERd3W.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QM6r-ApCsyU/U4ihGbOoSoI/AAAAAAAAsqU/sCMPjMPRxUA/s1600/ceHUykgMyRGe8LINJ.0fwiOeFERd3W.jpg\" height=\"360\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">George ( Senise ) is Lennie's ( Malkovitch ) protector, having promised Lennie's aunt he would take care of Lennie after she\ndied.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since Lennie is\nmentally challenged , George has got to walk him through every day life. George\nmistakenly believes that he can protect Lennie from himself because Lennie will\ndo anything George says .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lennie is totally\ndevoted to George like how a dog is devoted to its master,&nbsp; and he tries his best to follow George's\ncommands to the T.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was this time\nwhen George told Lennie to jump into the river ,</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and he did so without ado, and nearly lost\nhis life.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since that incident George,</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">though quick witted , was wary of what he\ncould tell Lennie.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a black man\nnamed Crooks who is not allowed in the bunkhouse with the white ranch hands, an\nexample of American racism in those days . &nbsp;Crooks had to make himself comfortable &nbsp;in the barn with the ranch animals. &nbsp;Lennie has NO idea why Crooks sleeps in the\nbarn.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But strangely Lennie\nalways remembers his dream of co- owning his own farm with George . Lennie\nknows the words of the dream by heart, &nbsp;and he can finish the sentences even though he\ndoes not remember where he and George are going tomorrow or figure out anything\nelse on his own. &nbsp;George's voice, echoing\nthis dream, seems almost like a prayer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He emphasizes that the\ndream makes them special; they are different from other wandering migrants who\nhave no family and no home. They have each other, and some day they will have a\nfarm of their own where they can \"live off the fatta the lan'.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">George never really\nbelieves in this farm, but Lennie embraces it with childlike enthusiasm. Every\ntime he makes George tell their same story again and again , his enthusiasm ingnites\nthe mind of George. Lennie's innocence keeps the dream alive. Without Lennie,\nGeorge would be just like the other hands, wasting money on booze and whores , but\nwith Lennie, George has a strong sense of responsibility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lennie's interpretation\nof this oft repeated dream is that he will get to tend them rabbits \u2014 soft,\nfurry animals that will provide him with that feeling of security. &nbsp;This farm is a place where he won't be scared\nor running, because he has \"done a bad thing.\" &nbsp;Lennie's voice fills with unbridled joy because\nsafety means soft things and tending the rabbits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lennie's greatest\nfeeling of security comes from petting soft things. &nbsp;When the rest of the world gets complicated\nand scary, petting soft things somehow helps Lennie feel safe. &nbsp;&nbsp;In\npetting dead mice, Lennie is doing something that makes him feel safe. &nbsp;Society as a whole would disapprove of what he\nis doing, &nbsp;but Lennie is NOT bright\nenough to see wrong in his actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
