, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NCP has been\ndecimated in the 2014 elections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A callous remark made\nby the Dy CM of Maharshtra Ajit Pawar did NOT go too well with the people\nreeling under drought, and farmer suicides. The sugar lobby and the sugar\nbarons of Maharashtra are responsible for farmers suicides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ajit Pawar smirked\u2014that\nhe can't be expected to urinate in the dam if there is no water in the dam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugarcane requires too\nmuch water for cultivation. &nbsp; The farmers are forces to take loans and dig\nborewells . The latest entrant digs a deeper borewell and the rest go dry, due\nto grounder water level lowering in the aquifer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sugar barons\nmonopolise the ground water.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RNa38Lxv5fw/U35Ue33enZI/AAAAAAAAsZo/hWxZcOmhlg0/s1600/imaghkles.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RNa38Lxv5fw/U35Ue33enZI/AAAAAAAAsZo/hWxZcOmhlg0/s1600/imaghkles.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Droughts make for good\nbusiness, moolah can be made faaast. . Private contractors supply water tankers\nand relief works in the form of digging more borewells . The state can ask for\nmore and more money to tackle the droughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DROUGHT PRONE AREAS\nMUST NOT GROW SUGAR CANE.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY, YOU GREEDY SUGAR CANE BARONS OF MAHARASHTA&nbsp; \u2014 THE PEOPLE KNOW WHO YOU ARE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you , it is NOT\neasy to survive in Maharashtra if you oppose sugarcane cultivation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mindless sugar\nproduction is the real reason so many farmers have committed suicide in Maharashtra,\nthe reason given in the paid up media will be drought. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO drought.\nThe water level was depleted by mindless water extraction from the underground\naquifer.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ULAHoP91EzM/U35TkiPegyI/AAAAAAAAsZg/c_7hsrvo7y0/s1600/ffrt1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 81% of the\nsugar production in Maharashtra happens in drought-prone districts. &nbsp;In these drought-prone areas, the average\nannual rainfall 700mm of rain whereas sugarcane crop needs 2100mm of rainfall. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet sugar cane is the\nmost preferred crop in the drought prone areas. Why do farmers vote for these\nsugar baron families ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lakhs of people are migrating\nout of the affected areas deserting their cattle and fields to dry and die. &nbsp;The reservoirs have depleted. &nbsp;&nbsp;What has made this situation more macabre is\nthat it is not a simple instance of lack of normal rainfall but the callous\nattitude , fu#k you attitude , and bad policies of the government.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The mushrooming water fun and theme parks that divert huge quantities of\nwater for leisure and pleasure. Bribes &nbsp;( lobbying ) &nbsp;ensure these parks get enough water &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E7_coKJI3Uc/U35TU7xWiuI/AAAAAAAAsZY/8KTKDGyQv90/s1600/0ghji.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-E7_coKJI3Uc/U35TU7xWiuI/AAAAAAAAsZY/8KTKDGyQv90/s1600/0ghji.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rich man wants to\nplay golf. These golf courses lower the ground water level. As of now, the\nstate has 22 golf courses, with more in the pipeline. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water used for cultivating one acre of\nsugarcane can be used to cultivate 12 acres of food grains. &nbsp;&nbsp;65% of sugar mills (sugarcane growth) is\nlocated in the drought-prone areas. &nbsp;But\nwith Maharashtra politics controlled by sugar barons nothing will change\u2014let the\npoor farmers die\u2014who cares ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharashtra has spent huge\nsums of money on small and local irrigation projects. But with zilch. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5BM6f-D9zj0/U36A7MV-AzI/AAAAAAAAsZ4/LneDowNXOJs/s1600/1RRT056.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS INTERLINKING WILL\nDO EVEN WORSE, AS IT IS DELIBERATE HUMAN SABOTAGE. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MOTHER OF ALL\nCIVILIZATIONS, SARASWATI 9000 BC &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obviously Justice B N\nKripal , who had given the river interlinking order on Oct 31, 2002, with a ridiculous\ndeadline of 2012, to boot , did so a couple of days before he retired as a\nJudge of the Supreme Court &nbsp;, he probably\nwanted to engrave his name in the history books of India , in shining letters &nbsp;of gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wanna know what Capt\nAjit Vadakayil thinks?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He thinks that this man\nshould be punished for judicial over reach. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have many such corny\njudgements \u2013 &nbsp;let me recall about a Indian\njudge who told about \u201cmilk of compassion\u201c and Sigmund Freud , which made NO\nsense. &nbsp;The only sense was that tried to\npass himself as erudite.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is this psychoanalyst\nSigmund Freud an intellectual by any stretch of the imagination ?&nbsp; He wrote volumes about ego without an effin' clue. &nbsp;He must know that only meditation\ncan help him discover something beyond&nbsp;\nmind. &nbsp;It is impossible to dip out\nof Vedic philosophy otherwise, the way he did .&nbsp;</span></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The western psychoanalyst is\nafraid of meeting an eastern sage , because shallow western philosophy , (other\nthan what is lifted from the ancient Vedic thought and stitched together in a\nclumsy manner) , is based on shifting sands , and has no foundation.&nbsp; </span>&nbsp;</span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Indian sage will ever commit\nsuicide like western psychoanalysts.</span> </span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hindu mysticism is not\nabout only intellectual understanding and splitting hairs in a way nobody will\nunderstand , and hence ask no questions , but is based on transformation of the\nman himself.&nbsp; The psychoanalyst is NOT\neven a teacher. He pretends to know everything about the mind, but the poor guy\ndoes not know how to change his own mind, leave alone the pupil's.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Feb 2012, the chief\nJustice S H Kapadia renewed the FIAT , with a new deadline of 2016 \u2013or it could\nbe contempt of court, right?. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HULLO?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is the judiciary\nexpected by our Indian constitution to &nbsp;\"approve\" and \"disapprove\"\ngovernment's projects with dead lines ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does the Indian constitution\nof even commonsense , expect a court to approve, object, &nbsp;propose, suppose, anything-- &nbsp;other than to provide their opinion on the\nmatter in hands based upon their knowledge and understanding of the law of\nland. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The river interlinking\nidea got a great boost when &nbsp;President\nAbdul Kalam mentions the need for river linking in his independence day speech &nbsp;of 2002..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me dissect this\ndispassionately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abdul Kalam is a hero\nof India\u2014 &nbsp;he was my No 1 hero too, &nbsp;till Narendra Modi came long , which pushed\nhim to a close No 2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Abdul</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Kalam is an Muslim\nwho is INDIAN FIRST . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is a great patriot ,\nwho raised the level of the President\u2019s chair to dizzying heights ( promptly brought\ndown below chart datum by the next woman president installed by W ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in this case Abdul Kalam has sub-consciously and inadvertently allowed the fact that his home state\nof Tamil Nadu &nbsp;(the most deficient state\nof India , when it comes to river water) &nbsp;, affect his sound judgment.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XH81Qd_uhK0/U3-MWQB37OI/AAAAAAAAsbM/w4mOg7PtF-4/s1600/inline;+filename-=ISO-8859-ffrt1''kalam.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XH81Qd_uhK0/U3-MWQB37OI/AAAAAAAAsbM/w4mOg7PtF-4/s1600/inline;+filename-=ISO-8859-ffrt1''kalam.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">River interlinking is\nNOT something that a Govt cando HUSH HUSH.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Total transparency is required in\nthis internet age, as the people are stakeholders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Digging canals to\ncreate more tributaries of the main river or extending the tributaries or\ninterconnecting the tributaries of the same river is NOT river\ninterlinking.&nbsp; This has been done in\nIndia successfully for a long time.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The problem is when you\ntry to interlink two separate rivers \u2013 two separate entities , and make them\none or merge them.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>This is when sh#t hits\nthe fan.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea of\ninterlinking rivers is appealing because it is so grand. &nbsp;But this is a MAD plan which will kill India,\nI tell this as a desh bhakt &nbsp;. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rivers are naturally formed water flow systems\nwhich has flown for thousands of years and&nbsp;\nfound &nbsp;comfort and peace with\nitself . &nbsp;Tampering with them will only\nkill them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all it is so\nexpensive that India has to take a loan from Rothschild controlled financial\ninstitutions. &nbsp;All this when there are\nmore pressing matters at hand , in nation building.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upstream dams, &nbsp;have killed rivers, leaving them looking like almost\nstagnant drainage canals with neither flow of water, nor the availability of\nnew water. &nbsp;The dam reservoir evaporates\na lot of water .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The downstream flow is unable to charge underground aquifers .\nWhere the river meets the sea, there is SEVERE salt water intrusion, which\nkills all underground aquifers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saltwater intrusion is\nthe movement of saline water into freshwater aquifers near the coast, which\nleads to contamination of drinking water sources .&nbsp; &nbsp;Because\nsaltwater has a higher mineral content than freshwater, it is denser and has a\nhigher water pressure. As a result, saltwater can push inland beneath the\nfreshwater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unchecked borewell\nextraction (<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> with FREE electricity given to farmers</span></b> &nbsp;) &nbsp;have\nincreased saltwater intrusion in many coastal areas. &nbsp;&nbsp;Water extraction drops the level of fresh\ngroundwater, reducing its water pressure and allowing saltwater to flow further\ninland. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cyclone caused and sea water\nsurges make saltwater intrusion worse. Larger storms produce larger storm\nsurges and this combined with a rise in sea level could result in much higher\nrates of coastal erosion which would in turn impact on the levels of saline\nintrusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fresh groundwater\nflows from inland areas towards the coast where elevation and groundwater\nlevels are lower. Because saltwater has a higher content of dissolved salts and\nminerals, it is denser than freshwater, causing it to have higher hydraulic\nhead than freshwater.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JCEh_qVPKvU/U3-UKlo-XSI/AAAAAAAAsbc/upmTtMvBc7Q/s1600/imaGUTRges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JCEh_qVPKvU/U3-UKlo-XSI/AAAAAAAAsbc/upmTtMvBc7Q/s1600/imaGUTRges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydraulic head refers to the liquid pressure exerted by a\nwater column- &nbsp;a water column with higher\nhydraulic head will move into a water column with lower hydraulic head, if the\ncolumns are connected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The saltwater and\nfreshwater meet in a transition zone where mixing occurs through dispersion and\ndiffusion. Ordinarily the inland extent of the saltwater wedge is limited\nbecause fresh groundwater levels, or the height of the freshwater column,\nincreases as land elevation gets higher. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drainage networks constructed to drain flat\ncoastal areas can lead to intrusion by lowering the freshwater table, reducing\nthe water pressure exerted by the freshwater column.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mHftn4fpOgM/U3-VJkv8McI/AAAAAAAAsbk/xVbcGzzCvQw/s1600/Saltwater+iny4jutrusifon.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mHftn4fpOgM/U3-VJkv8McI/AAAAAAAAsbk/xVbcGzzCvQw/s1600/Saltwater+iny4jutrusifon.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The change of hydraulic\nproperties by the saltwater intrusion. A mixture of saltwater and freshwater is\noften undersaturated with respect to calcium, triggering dissolution of calcium\nin the mixing zone and changing hydraulic properties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The process known as\ncation exchange, which slows the advance of a saltwater intrusion and also\nslows the retreat of a saltwater intrusion. When groundwater levels in aquifers\nare depleted faster than they can recharge. &nbsp;This is directly related to the position of\nthe interface and determines the amount of saltwater that can intrude into the\nfreshwater aquifer system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since saltwater\nintrusion is directly related to the recharge rate of the groundwater, this\nallows for other factors that may contribute to the encroachment of seawater\ninto the freshwater aquifers.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pJNrk9DJlBY/U3-VY4tyUrI/AAAAAAAAsbs/sUcLkSiow9g/s1600/saltwatintrusMHBFion.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"304\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pJNrk9DJlBY/U3-VY4tyUrI/AAAAAAAAsbs/sUcLkSiow9g/s1600/saltwatintrusMHBFion.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">It is important to stop\npumping from a&nbsp; saline&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">bore well</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;, until\nthe natural recharge rate of the aquifer can force the&nbsp;saltwater freshwater\ninterface back to its normal position. This process can take a long time and it\nreduces the freshwater availability of this region.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water quality has\nsuffered immensely due to poor implementation of waste management laws, leading\nto large-scale pouring of effluents and sewage into rivers and water bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without interlinking\nrivers , indiscriminate construction of canals and drainage networks can lead\nto saltwater intrusion at the coastal areas.&nbsp;\nPeople at the Indian coast have NO problems understanding what I write\nhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Water must never be\nused to score political brownie points.&nbsp;\nMinisters lay the foundation stone , and they want their names to be\nremembered for posterity . So they arm twist all and sundry to get the project completed\u2014all for\nselfish reasons.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some amount of river\nwater MUST flow to the sea. The brackish water at the river mouth sustains a\nlarge quantity of marine organisms and fish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reducing the flow of\nriver downstream of a dam , or by diversion via canals will increase the\nconcentration of pollutants in the river. &nbsp;Many marine species has become extinct.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zk4WsIG8SYQ/U3-XOgVENhI/AAAAAAAAsb0/rPceH93Wsjk/s1600/cauvery-disputes-trifhbunal-award_14894.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"490\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zk4WsIG8SYQ/U3-XOgVENhI/AAAAAAAAsb0/rPceH93Wsjk/s1600/cauvery-disputes-trifhbunal-award_14894.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1972 the then\nMinister for Irrigation K. L. Rao proposed a 2700 kilometer long canal link\nbetween the Ganges and Kaveri rivers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My idea of a holiday\nused to be as follows. &nbsp;Go with my family\nto some peaceful part of Kaveri river, where pristine water flows fast among\nrocks- &nbsp;just lie down an relax.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you the Kaveri\nwater looks like plain soda water. &nbsp;When\nI in Karnataka I prefer to drink Kaveri water , rather than Aquafina or Kinley\nor whatever mineral water , the taste is different.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now imagine you put\nsome muddy Ganges water into it by river interlinking . There goes my glass of\nwater and my nice holiday\u2014 who wants to lie down in muddy water!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3QE_kUIcJgo/U3-XmBFH6wI/AAAAAAAAsb8/ul1Hh6oYlKY/s1600/Waterfall+at+Cauvery+rivffrer_0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3QE_kUIcJgo/U3-XmBFH6wI/AAAAAAAAsb8/ul1Hh6oYlKY/s1600/Waterfall+at+Cauvery+rivffrer_0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">What India needs is NOT\ninterlinking Indian rivers. &nbsp;We must\ndevelop skills in recharging ground water aquifers . &nbsp;We have to develop skills in rainwater\nharvesting and divert this water into underground aquifers .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>VANISHING LAKES </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">And you will find my\npost in page 1 among 1.3 million posts. &nbsp;&nbsp;This post is invaluable\u2014and the contents must\nbe in the NCERT school books.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/RUt43dSOsZQ/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/RUt43dSOsZQ&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/RUt43dSOsZQ&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before -- building\na dam to hold water is a STUPID way.&nbsp; The\nenormous water body ( artificial lake ) causes massive loss of water due to\nevaporation. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The bright thing to do is\nto store the water underground. This underground bank of water ( where there is\nNO evaporation or flow to the sea ) is called an AQUIFER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole crisis of\nwater management today is due to total neglect of water harvesting and\nrecharging aquifers . We must do it in another 10 years , or India\u2019s dream to be\na superpower will be just an elusive mirage .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">River inter linking is\nbased on the mindless theory that the excess water in some rivers in spate\nduring the monsoon can be diverted to other rivers. &nbsp;This way, everyone will have enough water, and\nall can live happily ever after . TEE HEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me ask a retard ,\nor a dimwit\u2014&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Imagine a long river\nlike Ganges. &nbsp;Will it ever flood all\nalong the river banks from source to sea ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"><b>PPPBRRRRRR !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There \u2013 even the dimwit\nknows the answer !!.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the dimwit will\nsmirk if you suggest to him that&nbsp; once\nall rivers are interlinked like Capt Dastur\u2019s DHANSAK\u2014nay\u2014GARLAND, &nbsp;there will be equal water in all rivers&nbsp; ( like how BR Ambedkar wants all to be equal-- so\nlet us have ALL captains on a ship.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing Indians , by\ninterlinking rivers we create the ideal scenario for WATER WARS between linguistic\nstates and endless squabbling. &nbsp;This is what big brother wants to see.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Already Seemandhra has been deprived of water.\n&nbsp;Telengana will squeeze the Seemandra\nballs, and there will be salt water coastal intrusion. They have created deep\nrooted enmity between Telugu speaking brothers \u2014 all because the Italian Queen\nBee wanted votes and win the 2014 elections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">River interlinking will\nNOT solve India\u2019s water problems, it will create irreversible problems. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And this MAD theory of\nlifting the water upwards , crossing the Vindhyas and the Deccan Plateau&nbsp; \u2014what an effin\u2019 joke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The MAD dream that water\nwill be taken from regions with floods to regions with drought does not hold\u2014it\ndoes NOT work that way, if you an iota of perception. &nbsp;How many of these jokers heard of high water\nand low water ( by tides ) in the river deltas ? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Rivers are NOT drains to the sea, they support a whole ecosystem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why has the govt of\nIndia allowed all and sundry to HELP THEMSELVES to water stores in underwater\naquifers by bore wells, to play golf , water their lawns and gardens </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Are the people\naffected NOT supposed to know how we will equalize blood pressure by connecting\nthe arteries to the veins ? &nbsp;Ever heard\nof natural desilting of rivers which has gone on since hoary antiquity?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do dams\nallow silt to cross its walls ? Every time a dam fills up too high due to heavy\nrains, they open the sluice gates HUSH HUSH without warning and this causes\nloss of life and property down stream .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What happened at Kedarnath? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dams block marine life\nfrom flowing down sream. Large dams &nbsp;reduce groundwater recharge due to destruction\nof downstream river to a trickle thus unable to charge the underground aquifers.&nbsp; There is mindless damage to wetlands and\nlocal water systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the river\ninterlinking schemes affect the water resources of neighboring countries like &nbsp;Bhutan, Nepal and Bangladesh, and this is ill\nadvised. &nbsp;The Supreme court do NOT have &nbsp;jurisdiction beyond the Indian boundary. &nbsp;In India's constitution, water is essentially\na state subject.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: red;\">Most major rivers have\nan UNDER GROUND component unknown to the people and the government.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: red;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: red;\">This\nunderground component recharges the aquifers on either sides of the banks,\n--far away from the main river banks . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: red;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: red;\">So if you hold all the\nwater in a dam upstream ( where water keeps evaporating ), &nbsp;and the down stream past is just a trickle ,\nthe aquifers are deprived of the critical water charge , due to less\nhydrostatic pressure.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example the Amazon\nriver mouth has fresh water 200 miles into the salt laden sea .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above: TamilaNadu must worry about their own Indian farmers, than some alien Tamils in Sri Lanka.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why is Tamilnadu\nfighting with Karnataka over Cauvery river water. &nbsp;They have killed all their rivers.&nbsp; During the 1987 drought in Tamil Nadu the catchment\nareas did not receive any water, and there were only 3 weeks of good rain\nduring the whole year . The ground water level fell steeply, up to 12 meters. With\nNIL legislation the farmers overexploited ground water .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tami Nadu has planted\ncoconut trees &nbsp;trying to outdo Kerala. &nbsp;But darlings, Kerala has got abundant water. &nbsp;Crops which consume high amount of water like\ncoconuts should not be grown in large numbers in places like Western Tamil Nadu\nwhere water is scarce and you have to water the trees using borewells . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coconut absorbs a huge\namount of water. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sugarcane, which is\nalso water intensive, BUT farmers have the option of avoiding it in a drought\nyear. &nbsp;Coconut trees on the other hand,\nhave a life span of several decades, which exhausts ground water resources. &nbsp;&nbsp;Today\u2019s &nbsp;coconut plantations in Tamil Nadu are tomorrow's\ngraveyards of agriculture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many civilizations on\nthis planet were wiped out due to water resources mismanagement or natural\ncalamities. Saraswati civilization was wiped out in 4000 BC, because of a\ntectonic shift blocking the river mouth at the Himalayan glacier . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water borne diseases\nhave affected India in the past, but our rivers were insulated against each\nother . &nbsp;Our civilization in India\nexisted for this same reason along river banks-such was the wisdom of our\nancient maharishis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India is blessed by\nmighty rivers and vast lakes . The modern man killed most of the lakes,\naquifers and lakes. &nbsp;We had beggars dressed\nas kings ruling us, and hence this sorry state today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morons want to treat\nrivers like electricity grid lines or railway tracks-- to shunt one wagon to\nanother railway line. &nbsp;Who are our\npoliticians. We live in an age where the last refuge of a scoundrel is in\npolitics. &nbsp;Most of these people serving\nas MP and MLAs , we all know what they are worth. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today you see AAP under\nAK-49 doing endless rabble rousing. Now they will perish just because of a court order . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A river has its own &nbsp;ecosystem. The river floods the banks often\nand in the process the the humous floodplains get refurbished each year with\nfertile silt. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These were the breadbasket\nregions of India , till the GREEN revolution introduced artificial fertilizer chemicals\nwhich made the soil endlessly thirty . Who has allowed people to make homes in\nsuch vulnerable areas ( for vote banks ) , and get displaced ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, most of our\nmajor rivers are blessed with an underwater component \u2013 a parallel river underground\n, with may NOT run exactly under the river or even nearby . This component\nrecharges the aquifers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IT TAKES A REAL IDIOT \u2013NAY\u2014\nA DRIPPING CHOOT ,&nbsp; TO DECLARE THAT ALL\nTHE WATER IN THE GANGES RIVER IS MELTED SNOW. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ganges river draws\nwater from the aquifer and gives water to the aquifer , in a give and take\nmanner. By building dams and reducing the flow to a trickle , you are playing\naround with these underground aquifers . Why do you think most of India\u2019s lakes and minor\nrivers have vanished ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VtQihU0wCrk/U4EM1dFTXuI/AAAAAAAAsdk/YbWPx0QA5x4/s1600/water_scarcitnkky.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"376\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VtQihU0wCrk/U4EM1dFTXuI/AAAAAAAAsdk/YbWPx0QA5x4/s1600/water_scarcitnkky.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Artificial fertilizers\npollute the aquifers. Why do you think Singapore has to import water from Malaysia.\n&nbsp;In their haste to attract tourism, they\nplanted Singapore grass and plants all over . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The toxic chemicals in the artificial fertilizers\nhave poisoned the aquifers of Singapore. &nbsp;You hardly see any soil when you drive around\nin Singapore\u2014all you see is asphalt, grass, cement and tiles . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With no rivers or lakes\nor aquifers to tap for potable fresh water, Singapore's only indigenous source\nof water is rainfall collected in its 14 reservoirs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These idiots must also\nknow that floods do not occur because of 'too much water'. &nbsp;They are a direct result of too little aBsorption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With adequate\nvegetation along the entire river, the 'wetness' seeps deep and far into the\nbanks creating fertile floodplains on which we grow our food. &nbsp;Billions of little wild creatures interact\nwith the humous soil and the vegetation in moist conditions, making these flood\nplains fertile beds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic fertilizer propagated\nby the GREEN revolution , has long-term consequences on environmental and human\nhealth.&nbsp; &nbsp;Fertilizer nitrogen will be still present in\nthe soil organic matter more than a quarter century after application. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12% of the applied\nfertilizer leaked toward the water tables, thus contaminating drinking water. &nbsp;The leaching continues for maybe another fifty\nyears. Nitrogen contamination of aquatic ecosystems is a serious emerging\nenvironmental issue. </span>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the nitrate\nreaches these aquifers, the aquifers will remain contaminated for several decades,\neven if there is a substantial reduction in the nitrate loading of the surface.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rfnBcerxh3o/U4EToLTX5RI/AAAAAAAAseE/NQNr_ni0YF0/s1600/impp%5Bages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rfnBcerxh3o/U4EToLTX5RI/AAAAAAAAseE/NQNr_ni0YF0/s1600/impp%5Bages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soil contamination can\noccur when pesticides persist and accumulate in soils, which can alter\nmicrobial processes, increase plant uptake of the chemical, and also cause\ntoxicity to soil organisms. Pesticides accumulate in animals that eat\ncontaminated pests and soil organisms. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pesticides can be more\nharmful to beneficial insects, such as pollinators, and to natural enemies of\npests (i.e. insects that prey on or parasitize pests) than they are to the\ntarget pests themselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pesticide leaching\noccurs when pesticides mix with water and move through the soil, ultimately\ncontaminating groundwater. The amount of leaching is correlated with particular\nsoil and pesticide characteristics and the degree of rainfall and irrigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the major\ninputs of heavy metals (e.g. lead, cadmium, arsenic, mercury) into agricultural\nsystems are modern artificial fertilizers.&nbsp;\nA pesticide may be a chemical substance, biological agent (such as a\nvirus or bacteria), antimicrobial, disinfectant or device used against any\npest. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do you think the\nyouth of Punjab gone crazy with drugs?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrates in water has\ncontributed to Alzheimer\u2019s disease , thyroid problems and diabetes. &nbsp;Hypothyroid mother have created a generation\nof DAFT ( <b><span style=\"color: red;\">akkal ka dushman</span></b> ) &nbsp;babies.&nbsp; Nitrate is best known\nfor her effects on infants who are exposed through drinking water and breast\nmilk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2og1xFJhRVs/U4ETP5byJfI/AAAAAAAAsd8/LrArW2GILwc/s1600/nitratddfes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2og1xFJhRVs/U4ETP5byJfI/AAAAAAAAsd8/LrArW2GILwc/s1600/nitratddfes.jpg\" width=\"508\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At high levels,\nnitrates can poison humans, particularly children. Lower levels of nitrates can\nalso be deadly to amphibians. Certain forms of nitrogen are released as gases,\ncontributing to acid rain and climate change. Rainwater runoff brings\nfertilizers into streams, rivers, lakes and oceans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Absorbed nitrite is\nrapidly oxidized to nitrate in the blood. Nitrite in the bloodstream is\ninvolved in the oxidation of haemoglobin (Hb) to methaemoglobin (metHb): the Fe2+\npresent in the haem group is oxidized to its Fe3+ form, and the remaining\nnitrite binds firmly to this oxidized haem. The Fe3+ form does not allow oxygen\ntransport, owing to the strong binding of oxygen. Nitrite is mutagenic. It\ncauses morphological transformations in in vitro systems.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chronic exposure to\nchromium, lead and other metals, petroleum, solvents, and many pesticide and\nherbicide formulations can be carcinogenic, can cause congenital disorders, or\ncan cause other chronic health conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contaminated or\npolluted soil directly affects human health through direct contact with soil or\nvia inhalation of soil contaminants which have vaporized; potentially greater\nthreats are posed by the infiltration of soil contamination into groundwater\naquifers used for human consumption, sometimes in areas apparently far removed\nfrom any apparent source of above ground contamination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contaminants typically\nalter plant metabolism, often causing a reduction in crop yields. This has a\nsecondary effect upon soil conservation, since the languishing crops cannot\nshield the Earth's soil from erosion. Some of these chemical contaminants have\nlong half-lives and in other cases derivative chemicals are formed from decay\nof primary soil contaminants.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TVHe4YDYmrU/U4EVbYEYqGI/AAAAAAAAseY/VL99wVEKsKw/s1600/Nitratryues.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Application of nitrogen\nfertilizers compromises future food production by degrading soil fertility, and\ncompromises the health of the farmers and their families by polluting the\ndrinking water they depend on.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Sampling\ndone in several districts of &nbsp;Punjab\nshows that 25 percent of all sampled wells have nitrate levels above the safety\nlimit of 50 mg of - nitrate per litre established by the World Health\nOrganisation (WHO).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our jokers &nbsp;think that a canal with waterproof lining can\nreplace the living earth. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
