float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3581056505277055274\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_113M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_16.html?showComment=1526561833678#c3581056505277055274\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 17, 2018 at 6:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.newyorker.com/news/dispatch/how-indias-welfare-revolution-is-starving-citizens<br />\n<br />\nBENAMI MEDIA AND FAKE NEWS..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS A FOOD SURPLUS NATION.. 40% OF PRODUCED FOOD GOES WASTE...<br />\n<br />\nWE CAN REDUCE THE WASTE TO 3% IF WE ADOPT OZONE..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE NO HUNGER DEATHS IN INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT-- WE MUST STOP FAKE NEWS AND FINE THE DESH DROHI MEDIA BARONS ...<br />\n<br />\nSHUT DOWN DESH DROHI FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">GREEN REVOLUTION HAS HARMED FOOD PRODUCTION... OUR HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL WAS REPLACED BY CHEMICAL LADEN WATER THIRSTY SOIL .. SOIL AEREATING EARTH WORMS HAVE DISAPPEARED ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nLegend has it that 6000 years ago , Lord Parashurama CREATED snake groves in Kerala to increase Humus acid in Keralas\u2019s top soil. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe gardeners job is to increase the amount of humus in soil. \u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Think of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">\n<div>\nWE CAN STOP FARMER SUICIDES..</div>\n</span><br />\nHUMUS IN TOP SOIL GAVE INDIA PRICELESS FLORA FOLLOWING THE GOLDEN MEAN..<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026. 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nSnakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe humic substance contains various functional groups of carboxylic, carbonyl, phenolic, alcoholic with higher molecular weight of 40,000 to 70,000 and higher cation exchange capacity (100-130 meq/100 gm). Lignite contains more of humic acid\u2026..---<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026.. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026\u2026. Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026\u2026\u2026The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026.. Better soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.While these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_113BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: medium;\">Again, Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.. .</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n<div>\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026\u2026..&nbsp;</div>\n</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">HUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026\u2026</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">MOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026\u2026..</span><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRead all 6 parts of the post below..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534063449317#c6342733295400532677\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 12, 2018 at 2:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_171MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>RUSH RUSH RUSH..</b></span><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WARNING--.</b></span><br /><br />THERE IS A SCARE IN KERALA THAT THERE ARE EARTH QUAKE TREMORS , CAUSING CRACKS ON HOME WALLS AND COMPOUND WALLS ..<br /><br />THESE CRACKS ( WHEN FAR AWAY FROM A DAM ) HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH EARTH QUAKES ..IT HAS TO DO WITH INSUFFICIENT FOUNDATION OF THE STRUCTURE..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">I WARN THE KERALA CM -- DO NOT ALLOW IDUKKI DAM RESERVOIR TO GO BEYOND 2402 FEET HEIGHT\u2026 TAKE THIS FROM A MAN WHO IS AN EXPERT ON WATER..</span><br /><br />NOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS BEEN BUILT WITH INBUILT DE-SILTING FACILITIES..<br /><br />AS A RESULT WHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED, THE STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGES INCREASE THE WATER LEVEL ARBITRARILY, LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT MULLAPERIAR.. ALL THEY DELIBERATE ON IS IF THE DAM WALL S STRONG ENOUGH\u2026<br /><br />THESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO TAKE TECHNICAL DECISIONS ( PIL BASED ) ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..<br /><br />WHEN WATER LEVEL IS RAISED , IMMEDIATELY WATER SURFACE AREA IN THE SILTED RESERVOIR INCREASES --INUNDATING MORE LAND AROUND.. MORE SURFACE AREA MEANS MORE EVAPORATION OF WATER HELD BY THE DAM .<br /><br />THE MORE DANGEROUS THING IS THIS CAN CAUSE LANDSLIDES AND SOLITION WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WHICH CAN CRASH INTO THE DAM WALL BREACHING IT..<br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">CRITICAL MESSAGE --- NOW ABOUT TREMORS NEAR DAMS ..</span><br /><br />GOD NEVER INTENDED MAN TO BUILD DAMS..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN HUGE DAMS ARE BUILT WITH HIGH WATER LEVELS IN THE RESERVOIR IT CAUSE GEOPATHIC STRESS WHICH MAKES THE AREA TREMOR PRONE.</span></b><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">RESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED RIS ( RESERVOIR INDUCED SEISMICITY)...THIS SUBJECTS HAS BEEN STUDIES AS POST DISASTER REACTIONS \u2013 AND NEVER PROACTIVELY BEFORE BUILDING A DAM..<br /><br />80% OF INDIAs LARGE DAMS ARE PRONE TO RIS \u2013 AS THEY HAVE BEEN BUILT WITHOUT PROPER GEOLOGICAL STUDIES ON UNSUITABLE AREAS \u2026</span></b><br /><br />Reservoirs can both increase the frequency of earthquakes in areas of already high seismic activity and cause earthquakes to happen in areas previously thought to be seismically inactive.<br /><br />Artificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br /><br />In these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br /><br />This significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br /><br />The 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br /><br />LATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA---<br /><br />Latur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br /><br />The 1979 MORVI DAM BURST ( rajkot , gujarat ) is in the Guinness book of world records.<br /><br />Has India ever investigated the reason for 26,000 deaths at Morvi due to induced seismicity ?<br /><br />Has India investigates the 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir.<br /><br />In dam water reservoirs, the crushing weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">God has made huge NATURAL lakes in safe areas --unlike man's ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.</span><br />Significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake. When dam reservoirs are filled or drained, induced seismicity can occur immediately or with a small time lag.<br /><br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Trojan Horse is a\ntale from the Trojan war penned by Greek Homer in 850 BC, about the stratagem that\nallowed the Greeks finally to enter the city of Troy and end the conflict.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a fruitless 10-year siege, the Greeks constructed a huge wooden horse,\nand hid a select commando force of soldiers inside, and left&nbsp; this parting gift in front of the walls of\nthe city of Troy. This giant wooden horse which appeared to be an offering to\nAthena -- a peace offering..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Greeks then pretended to sail away.&nbsp; The jubilant Trojans dragged the monstrous,\nwheeled, wooden horse into their city , as a trophy , to celebrate the end of\nthe 10 years of fighting.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That night, while the Trojans were more than a little\ncomatose from too much drinking and merry making , the Greeks slipped quietly\nout the trap door Odysseus had had built in the Trojan horse's belly.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They opened the huge doors of the walled city\n, let in the invaders from outside , set fire to the city--and won a war they\nhad no hope of winning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: The ancient kingdom of Gandhara&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--iO2vaPiS_Y/U3APGjZ46TI/AAAAAAAAsIQ/iN3sX0-w8_w/s1600/220px-GandLLJhara.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--iO2vaPiS_Y/U3APGjZ46TI/AAAAAAAAsIQ/iN3sX0-w8_w/s1600/220px-GandLLJhara.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Did this Trojan Horse\nepisode actually happen at Troy or was it a fable.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: &nbsp;An ancient relief unearthed at the ancient\nkingdom of Gandhara. ( Balochistan ) --</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;a 6000 year old stone\nsculpture exhumed from the northern bank of Dargai Canal , North of Peshawar.</span></span></i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F9jxRcdFP3A/U3AOmQQ2E9I/AAAAAAAAsII/wZDce2t1hIc/s1600/A+relief+carving+showing+aSSS+Trojan+horse+on+wheels.+Gandhara+School,+Pakistan+c.2nd-3rd+century.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"513\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-F9jxRcdFP3A/U3AOmQQ2E9I/AAAAAAAAsII/wZDce2t1hIc/s1600/A+relief+carving+showing+aSSS+Trojan+horse+on+wheels.+Gandhara+School,+Pakistan+c.2nd-3rd+century.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>It was a fable\nconcocted by Greek Homer, lifted from two TRUE stories which happened in India\u2014\none with a stuffed horse and the other with a stuffed elephant .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bW_mczHNMcg/U3APScxr2eI/AAAAAAAAsIY/P19lDgGnXXA/s1600/dowDDDnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bW_mczHNMcg/U3APScxr2eI/AAAAAAAAsIY/P19lDgGnXXA/s1600/dowDDDnload.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Mahabharata the much\nmaligned prince Sakuni was from the kingdom of Gandara . &nbsp;His beautiful elder sister princess Gandhari\nhad a phobia of the dark and she would be terrified of darkness . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_cWetpOjV1A/U3CrmbQNApI/AAAAAAAAsNM/rim9MXSj0M8/s1600/GandharaHH+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"395\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_cWetpOjV1A/U3CrmbQNApI/AAAAAAAAsNM/rim9MXSj0M8/s1600/GandharaHH+(1).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Kandahar in Afghanistan\nwas named Gandhari before. </span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-T1HyBy5XMW0/U3CrfQkKhgI/AAAAAAAAsNE/0gjUgOOZMV4/s1600/Img21HJUK4269076.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"435\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-T1HyBy5XMW0/U3CrfQkKhgI/AAAAAAAAsNE/0gjUgOOZMV4/s1600/Img21HJUK4269076.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grand sire Bhishma&nbsp; proposed the marriage of Gandhari to blind\nking Dhritarashtra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: &nbsp;Sanjaya\nteleports and gives blind king Dhritarasthtra a blow by blow account of the\nwar, happening hundreds of miles away..</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Cb2S8qhuas8/U3AQ0LOUcXI/AAAAAAAAsI0/SEQQfvObEtw/s1600/2540801562_e85aDab4059.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Cb2S8qhuas8/U3AQ0LOUcXI/AAAAAAAAsI0/SEQQfvObEtw/s1600/2540801562_e85aDab4059.jpg\" width=\"435\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankuni was terribly\nupset and he knew that his elder chaste sister would tie a blindfold over her\neyes , and would die a thousand deaths , every minute of her life .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet never did Queen Gandhari\ncomplain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hSVc9hn6iFg/U3AQqDoSF9I/AAAAAAAAsIs/i6Rmv0NH9f8/s1600/1D5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"211\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hSVc9hn6iFg/U3AQqDoSF9I/AAAAAAAAsIs/i6Rmv0NH9f8/s1600/1D5.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When war broke out\nGandhari suddenly cried out in anguish&nbsp; \u201c\nI am as much afraid of this war, as this endless darkness \u201c.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was her only\nutterance of her endless suffering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">And being a loyal wife and a bharatiya naree, she took her sword and wanted to go to war, to protect her Kaurava sons.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Below:&nbsp; Unable to see her dying son -- one last\ntime!!</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QMuqxkLxpBU/U3AQaJa8EnI/AAAAAAAAsIk/g8OVPpzAEeE/s1600/downloaDdGTRHY65.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QMuqxkLxpBU/U3AQaJa8EnI/AAAAAAAAsIk/g8OVPpzAEeE/s1600/downloaDdGTRHY65.jpg\" width=\"330\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The story of the\nstuffed but hollow elephant happened in the ancient kingdom of Vatsa, around\nAllahabad..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Udayana was the ruler\nof Vatsa in 1900 BC, during the time of Lord Buddha. &nbsp;He was a Hindu king and all these stories by\nthe white invader that he converted to Buddhism is all bull.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild planted the FAKE story written by\nBhasa and exhumed it in Kerala in 1921. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This story Svapnavasavadattam or dream of Vasavadatta\nis a Sanskrit play in six acts, was planted just to show how Hinduism was such\na bad religion that several ancient Kings converted to Buddhism ( &nbsp;like emperor Ashoka ) .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Hindu Puranas\nstate that the Vatsa Kingdom ( with Capital at Kausambi ) was named after a\nKasi king, Vatsa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Udayana was a\ngreat Veena player and could charm wild elephants into submission just by his\nmusic. A rival king Pradyota had a huge hollow stuffed elephant made with\nsoldiers inside manipulating the trunk, ears and tail, making it look lifelike\nand sent it to King Udayana\u2019s kingdom as a decoy. ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Udayana promptly took\nhis veena and tried to tame the strange white elephant, alone without his\nsoldiers.. When they got close King Pradyota's soldiers who were hiding in the\nhollow belly of the decoy elephant, jumped out and captured him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pradyota\noffers to free him if Udayana teaches him how to cast a spell on &nbsp;animals with his veena. Udayana demands dakshina\ndue to a guru . Pradyota considers it demeaning and asks Udayana to teach a\nhunchback instead. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mHySfQTuzX4/U3AZX6uTgBI/AAAAAAAAsJE/oSXwQ4T_26U/s1600/ACK_VasavadattYa+(cover).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mHySfQTuzX4/U3AZX6uTgBI/AAAAAAAAsJE/oSXwQ4T_26U/s1600/ACK_VasavadattYa+(cover).jpg\" width=\"473\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hunchback is none\nother than his beautiful daughter Vasavadatta who is told that the guru is a\nleper , so they would be separated by curtains. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">During this training a verbal tiff between\nteacher and the girl student brings them face-to-face and they fall in love.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XUDSkdIUHwY/U3AZds9iAKI/AAAAAAAAsJQ/1qAn6pv4DeQ/s1600/downlYUIoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XUDSkdIUHwY/U3AZds9iAKI/AAAAAAAAsJQ/1qAn6pv4DeQ/s1600/downlYUIoad.jpg\" width=\"239\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vatsas were a\nbranch of the Kuru dynasty. &nbsp;The Puranas state\nthat after the washing away of Hastinapura by the Ganges, the Bharata king\nNicaksu, the great-great grandson of Janamejaya ( who built Kedarnath temple ) ,\nabandoned the city and settled in Kausambi. This is supported by the\nSvapnavaasavadatta and the Pratijna-Yaugandharayana attributed to Bhasa. Both\nof them have described the King Udayana as a scion of the Bharata family\n(bharata-kula).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JMmMdcgZ1xY/U3Aig7Tb0LI/AAAAAAAAsJw/5zdZDum3pg0/s1600/5-gandhara-GHKIOcivilization-artifacts-afp-670.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JMmMdcgZ1xY/U3Aig7Tb0LI/AAAAAAAAsJw/5zdZDum3pg0/s1600/5-gandhara-GHKIOcivilization-artifacts-afp-670.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Mahabharata 4000 BC,\nKing Dhristadyumna describes each of the kings assembled for the Swayamavara in\na letter to his sister Draupadi \u201c.......the mighty charioteer Srutayu, Uluka,\nKaitava, Chitrangada and Suvangada, the highly intelligent Vatsaraja (King of Vatsa\nKingdom), the king of Kosala, Sisupala and the powerful Jarasandha, these and\nmany other great kings\u2014all Kshatriyas celebrated throughout the world\u2014have\ncome, O blessed one, for thee.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Fldy7sV-PnI/U3AaEdCTSlI/AAAAAAAAsJU/jP4obUxIUtU/s1600/draupadi_swaghhyamvar3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">On day two of\nMahabharata war , at the battle ground of &nbsp;Kurukshetra, it is written:\n\"Dhristadyumna, the Commander-in-Chief of the Pandava army, forms the\nmilitary formation called Krauncharuma ( bird-shaped military array). &nbsp;&nbsp;Yudhishthira,\nwith the Patachcharas, the Hunas, the Pauravakas and the Nishadas, became its\ntwo wings, so also the Pisachas, with the Kundavishas, and the Mandakas, the\nLadakas, the Tanganas, and the Uddras, O Bharata, and the Saravas, the\nTumbhumas, the Vatsas and the Nakulas\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Self-serving friendships and family ties between businessmen\nand the government influence the economy and society to the extent that it\ncorrupts public-serving economic and political ideals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They convert our MPs\nand Ministers into desh-drohis and Judases with few pieces of silver. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The multi-nationals can\ncome to India to do business. We Indians will NOT allow them to\n\"lobby\"&nbsp; ( buy our minsters)\nand rule our country by remote control , and siphon off our nation's wealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government's priority\nin policy should be the countrys' and&nbsp;\ncitizens\u2019 interest. It can\u2019t be the other way around.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do we allow all\nthese foreign funded TV channels to dole out annual awards? These are sham\nawards for quid pro quo deals. &nbsp;Recently\nthe Election Commission was given an award by NDTV in the thick of elections. &nbsp;Is there no code of conduct ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What are all these foreign\nsupari fed TV sham awards for--if it is NOT for king making ? More often than\nnot they take instructions from their foreign owners , which CM to patronize.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uihTL570tSY/U3Co9CznadI/AAAAAAAAsMg/ipzOyX9xyPg/s1600/images,KKLUGkh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-uihTL570tSY/U3Co9CznadI/AAAAAAAAsMg/ipzOyX9xyPg/s1600/images,KKLUGkh.jpg\" width=\"380\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How did a bankrupt shoe\nshop owner, Gopal Goel Kanda make his millions and become the Home Minister too\nin Sonia Gandhi\u2019s&nbsp; UPA govt of\nHaryana?&nbsp; Are there no checks and\nstoppers ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This goon Kanda started an airline which had more young ,\ninexperienced , pretty and personally handpicked women employees,&nbsp; than men. He was sexually abusing his girl\nemployees , and when one of them committed suicide , the lid got blown off.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aWi6w2mzsOE/U3Cv3xX3IBI/AAAAAAAAsNg/tSSJVvRz_dE/s1600/photorrrs2013-5-13-11-49-29.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aWi6w2mzsOE/U3Cv3xX3IBI/AAAAAAAAsNg/tSSJVvRz_dE/s1600/photorrrs2013-5-13-11-49-29.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India we need a fast\nand efficient judiciary to handover judgments in fair and impartial manner&nbsp; without political and social pressure. We\nneed a clean and unbiased police that will come to the aid of those working on\nthe right side of the law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This type of a thing ,\nwhere as soon as a new home minister ( like Gopal Goyal Kanda ) takes over, he\ngets all honest police officers transferred , and installs his own minions and\nsidekicks, running at his beck and call, must be ended.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eQL9En-ZyU4/U3CvG9PFifI/AAAAAAAAsNY/APzddxmIDRI/s1600/Geetika-Godddpal-Goyal-Kanda.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"438\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eQL9En-ZyU4/U3CvG9PFifI/AAAAAAAAsNY/APzddxmIDRI/s1600/Geetika-Godddpal-Goyal-Kanda.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If India has to become\na super power we need to terminate criminalization of politics and rip\nasunder&nbsp; the nexus among criminals,\npoliticians and bureaucrats in India. We cannot allow such criminal networks to\nvirtually running a parallel government.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-srr8HwKvN0w/U3IxaIaOreI/AAAAAAAAsPE/BLrqJzzo2eQ/s1600/Boothwwww+Capturing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"308\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-srr8HwKvN0w/U3IxaIaOreI/AAAAAAAAsPE/BLrqJzzo2eQ/s1600/Boothwwww+Capturing.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to decimate\ncriminal gangs who enjoyed the patronage of corrupt politicians ( of all\npolitical parties)&nbsp; and protect the\nhonest government functionaries like IAS officer Khemka who exposed Robert\nWadhera -- nay- Vadra ( angrez hai na! ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery in bureaucracy\nis the reason for the higher cost of production of goods and services. Many\ntypes of bribes exist: tip, gift, sop, perk, skim, favor, discount, waived\nfee/ticket, free food, free ad, free trip, free tickets, sweetheart deal,\nkickback, funding, inflated sale of an object or property, lucrative contract,\ndonation, campaign contribution, fundraiser, sponsorship/backing, higher paying\njob, stock options, secret commission, or promotion (rise of rank), <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>scholarship for children in western university</b></span> etc .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JoD8llNRdLM/U3CnqcqAswI/AAAAAAAAsMI/9nHROmnIZk0/s1600/imageslkdjyuy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"361\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JoD8llNRdLM/U3CnqcqAswI/AAAAAAAAsMI/9nHROmnIZk0/s1600/imageslkdjyuy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Narendra Modi was\ndenied UK and USA visa, he declared \u201c Very soon they will come on their knees\nbegging for Gujarat visa\u201d .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: WHAAAA ? Only bribing Julian Assange ? Hey, what about bullying ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "243", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/513928098152041148/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4884212547627934074", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2014-05-08T20:35:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-05-08T20:39:31+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzk5NTYxNzcxMDQ5Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/hot-work-permit-on-chemical-tankers.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4884212547627934074", "title": "HOT WORK PERMIT ON CHEMICAL TANKERS  -  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x-YmAqxi9NM/U2ubBHpYtSI/AAAAAAAAsEk/x_r4h-zesvE/s1600/downloaEEEd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x-YmAqxi9NM/U2ubBHpYtSI/AAAAAAAAsEk/x_r4h-zesvE/s1600/downloaEEEd.jpg\" height=\"130\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>HOT WORK PERMIT ON CHEMICAL TANKERS</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> -&nbsp; CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE THING TO REMEMBER\nIS TO TAKE A SAMPLE OF THE LIQUID INSIDE A CARGO TANK\u2014 IT NEED NOT BE WATER, IT\nCOULD BE A FLAMMABLE OR TOXIC CHEMICAL.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMPANY POLICY REQUIRES\nTHE USE OF A RETURN CURRENT CABLE TO COMPLETE THE ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT TO THE\nELECTRIC ARC WELDING MACHINE &nbsp;( SAY FOR\nARC WELDING ON A CARGO TANK STEAM COIL ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHENEVER HOT WORK IS\nUNDERTAKEN THE FLAMMABILITY OF ADJACENT OR INTERCONNECTING AREAS MUST ALWAYS BE\nCONSIDERED AND ADEQUATE PRECAUTIONS TAKEN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On chemical tankers\nwith Nitrogen plant, the&nbsp; oxygen content\nof the atmosphere can be exceedingly rich at the exhaust, exceed&nbsp; 22% by volume, which can impregnate flammable\nmatter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A space is SAFE FOR\nFIRE when:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- --the concentration\nof flammable gas is less than 1% LFL, sludge and scale has been removed to the\nextent that ---- any residues will not produce flammable vapors under\nprevailing conditions or in the presence of hot work,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--all adjacent spaces\nhave been appropriately prepared to prevent the spread of fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-frErgBCynpg/U2ub9JmaDLI/AAAAAAAAsE4/UyW-oKNiPQA/s1600/tanker-bunga-alpinDEEia-on-fire-3-ships-19270.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-frErgBCynpg/U2ub9JmaDLI/AAAAAAAAsE4/UyW-oKNiPQA/s1600/tanker-bunga-alpinDEEia-on-fire-3-ships-19270.jpg\" height=\"263\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;CHEMICAL TANKER HOT WORK PERMIT&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">16.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Have you obtained hot work permission in\nwriting from the company?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">17.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Has OOW (Bridge, E/R, CCR) been advised ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">18.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Will a copy of this permit and the RISK\nASSESSMENT be displayed at the site?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">19. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Are you aware that any work which involves\ncontinious sparks require a HWP?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Master&nbsp; (name, signature, date ,\ntime):---------------<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Responsible officer in\ncharge of hot work ( name, signature, date, time ):---------------<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOT WORK IN A\nRESTRICTED AREA MUST NOT COMMENCE BASED ON THE ANTICIPATION OR ASSUMPTION OF\nRECEIPT OF WRITTEN PERMISSION FROM THE COMPANY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When requesting\nauthorisation to carry out hot work the following procedure must be complied\nwith:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Each job must be the\nsubject of a separate request.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Each request must\ngive sufficient details of the actual hot work involved for the job to be\nproperly assessed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Each request must\nconfirm that the precautions required by the appropriate sections of this\nChapter have been complied with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Each request must\nconfirm that a Gas Free Certificate and a Hot Work Restricted Area Work Permit\nwill be issued in accordance with these instructions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--Each request must\ngive the anticipated start and finishing times of the job.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A hot work authorization\nwill normally remain valid for no more than 24 hours. After this period the\nship must request an extension of the authorization confirming the status of\nthe job commenced and the precautions taken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brief daily progress\nreports should be sent to the Company. These reports must confirm that all\nprecautions continue to be maintained. The Company must be advised when the job\nis completed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After authorization for\nhot work has been received from the Company, the ship must continue to monitor\nthe environment to ensure that safe conditions are maintained for the duration\nof the job. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the\nresponsibility of the Chief Officer and Second Engineer who will be responsible\nfor completing, on a daily basis, a Gas Free Certificate and a Hot Work\nRestricted Area Work Permit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every precaution must\nbe taken to ensure that there is no cargo oil or hydrocarbon product in any\nheating coils. While compressed air will flush out product from a heating coil,\nit will not break down the clingage on the sides of the piping and the addition\nof air may create a flammable atmosphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steam is the only\nconvenient and safe method of purging heating coils and must be used. It has an\nadded advantage in that the condensed water within the coils lodges at the\nbottom of the system thus inerting the coils within the work area. Continue the\nsteaming of coils until all signs of oil disappear from the return piping on\ndeck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The engine room\nworkshop is not considered a Controlled Area as long as suitable Chief\nEngineer's Hot Work Safety Rules for Engine Room Workshop are clearly displayed\non site, laying down the minimum safety requirements and procedures for any hot\nwork in that space. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No hot work is to be\ncarried out in port whilst the ship is at a loading or discharge terminal or\nwhere port authorities have hot work restrictions in force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tests for flammable\ngases must be made on all ventilation systems that draw air from the outside of\nthe Controlled Area and ventilate the worksite. &nbsp;Hot work is prohibited within 0.5 metres of\nthe shell of any fuel, diesel, lube oil tank or any other tank containing a\npotential source of Hydrocarbon or flammable gases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O2-8Rf8wNEE/U2ua2QyoNdI/AAAAAAAAsEc/S5p1roGluc4/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O2-8Rf8wNEE/U2ua2QyoNdI/AAAAAAAAsEc/S5p1roGluc4/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nIREncUJUV4/U2eJvGBHqMI/AAAAAAAAsBA/4LreHCizUCU/s1600/A.PirateIndo0730_tttpirates_400x280.jpg\" height=\"280\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nsecond mate on watch was a Bihari Bhaiyya whose home was in a village where\ndacoits raiding Gabbar Singh style for Baajra and Anaaj was a weekly affair. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pirates tied up the\nFilipino helmsman on the wheel, so that he could still steer , but not run\naway. The Phillip channel &nbsp;is very narrow\nand treacherous. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EfBZl94YYoY/U2eJzrH1XrI/AAAAAAAAsBI/L3M-KxcW7GY/s1600/deer4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EfBZl94YYoY/U2eJzrH1XrI/AAAAAAAAsBI/L3M-KxcW7GY/s1600/deer4.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They took the Second\nmate down and he banged on the Captain\u2019s cabin door. \u201c Sir, pirates are on\nboard, and they are with me outside your cabin door. &nbsp;Please open \u201c.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The muff Indian captain\ndid NOT open the door, as he had several thousand US dollars in the safe . After\nrepeated knocking and even threats by the pirates that they will kill the\nsecond mate, the Captain still did NOT open. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To add insult to\ninjury&nbsp; the Bihari second mate was\nrefusing to be scared leave alone get traumatized .&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-h7T1sB2WmeE/U2eKqS10XFI/AAAAAAAAsBQ/JfdiFR7qKFY/s1600/jpgWO37GDgsrerVdz.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">After some time, the\npirates got fed up , cursed undertheir breaths , gave a few kicks on the ass of the second mate ( who was still devoid of fear ) and fled , as the fast ship was moving out of their safe territory\nzone &nbsp;. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
